sectionedDescription.access: There is parking in the garage and outside on the driveway, but do not park on the street as signs of NO PARKING are posted and you may be ticketed
sectionedDescription.description:
This is a 1100 sq. ft., 2bd/2ba duplex in Lowell, AR.  Unit has refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave, dishwasher, and brand new washer and dryer, and tile/vinyl plank flooring throughout.  Has two car garage available for use by guests. Great back yard patio that is privacy fenced, great for relaxing and grilling out. Master BR has a on-suite bath and walk in closet.  Ring security alarm system is provided and digital door lock. Codes will be provided upon booking/checking in.

Nestled in the center of Northwest Arkansas, quiet town of Lowell Ar. Owner occupied split duplex, so you have no worries of strange renters next door.  Enjoy free cable HD sports package in living room and in master bedroom.

There is parking in the garage and outside on the driveway, but do not park on the street as signs of NO PARKING are posted and you may be ticketed

My contact hours are 8am-8pm via AirBnB message

The Northwest Arkansas region is one of the fastest growing in the country. Rogers, Springdale, Fayetteville, Bentonville, and Bella Vista represent an interesting mix of small cities that all work together and all have unique offerings from The University of Arkansas and the Razorbacks, to fishing and boating on Beaver Lake, to Crystal Bridges, the Amazeum, and  the AMP theater and to golfing anywhere along the NWA corridor.   These cities are located in a north-south line roughly 10 miles apart and offer biking and walking trails connecting them to each other.   There is truly something for everyone.

The Razorback Regional Greenway in Northwest Arkansas is a project that has been years in the making. The concept of a regional greenway project has been a goal of regional planners, cities, and residents of Northwest Arkansas for more than two decades. This vision was supported by the Northwest Arkansas Regional Planning Commission (NWARPC), which in 2000 began a long-range planning process that included regional trails as a key component. A task force formed by the NWARPC conducted public meetings and facilitated a coordinated effort among the communities of Northwest Arkansas.
sectionedDescription.houseRules: There are no dogs or other pets allowed unless they are true assisstant service animals .  I had to make this house rule after having bad experiences with owners of large animals who shed profusely and salivate on furniture and linens.   When this happens,  it is very difficult for the  cleaning service to  properly clean the inside and outside areas before the next guest arrives.

name: Heart of Northwest Arkansas

reviews.comments:
Wow, Amazing!! This place is beautifully decorated, incredible spacious & has everything you could possibly need! I felt like I was at home. Huge tv in the living room, extremely clean and comfy beds, a desk area and printer for work, washer and dryer. AND just 8-10 mins from Rogers or Springdale. 
5 stars across the board!

listing.name: Heart of Northwest Arkansas

reviews.comments: The location was great and felt very safe.  The kitchen had everything we needed to cook with.  We would definitely stay here again!

listing.name: Heart of Northwest Arkansas

reviews.comments: Our stay was just OK.  First, the house is a duplex with the owners living next door.  Nowhere is that noted or pictured in the listing.    Secondly you might want rubber boots for the fenced yard that is supposed to be dog and kid friendly as it was a muddy mess with only a little rain.  What appears to be grass in the listing photos is actually moss.  Third, communication was not good. There are no check out instructions.  Also,  there  is a third bedroom that is listed that we never found.  While I would say that it is a very safe area, there appears to be a bullet hole in the front window as you pull in to the house.  And the house is very close to a busy road that you have to back out into every time you leave.

listing.name: Heart of Northwest Arkansas

primaryHost.about: Hi there!  We are George and Shirley.  We've been married 47 years and now that we have an empty nest we are excited to be hosts to the Airbnb community in North West Arkansas.
primaryHost.name: George & Shirley

sectionedDescription.access: You will have access to our whole Airbnb property.
sectionedDescription.description:
We  would like to share our home with up to 10 temporary guests.  Our home is located in the country yet close to the grocery store, gas station, & I49 in Lowell.  If you're going to the Razorback game, a graduation, the craft fairs, Bikes Blues and BBQ, this location is convenient for all the events in the Northwest Arkansas area!

Stop your search right here. We're very excited to rent our home to the Airbnb community in Northwest Arkansas. 

Our home has plenty of room for the whole family with three large bedrooms, a full bathroom and a total of 2200 square feet.

Each bedroom has a comfy bed with fresh sheets and a large smart TV.  for easy streaming.

The kitchen has beautiful granite counter tops, and is furnished with dishes silverware pots and pans and all the kitchen necessities you'll need for your stay.

The backyard has a patio with chairs and a grill for some backyard cooking.

If you enjoy biking you're in luck. The Razorback Greenway Trail is very close by. You can borrow our bikes & helmets to go on your own exciting excursion.

Not only will you fall in love with this rental, you will find yourself within a short driving distance from the airport, the best restaurants, shopping and entertainment in Northwest Arkansas!

You will have access to our whole Airbnb property.

We give guests their space but will always available to answer questions via call, text or email.

The Razorback Greenway Bike Trail is just down the street from our place.  We have two bikes & helmets you are welcome to use while staying with here.

There is public transportation if you need it.

We have fenced yard for pet and children

name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: Five stars all the way! This place has everything you could think of and more. Not only do the pictures and description match perfectly, but this place goes above and beyond other airbnbs by thinking of about every item you might’ve forgotten, plus some snacks! We enjoyed this place thoroughly and definitely recommend!

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: Great stay! So close to restaurants and entertainment! Super clean! Everything we needed for a weekend getaway! Would stay again and highly recommend!

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: A great place to stay! Definitely recommend staying!

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: This place was perfect for a weekend getaway to the area. We knew we wanted to check out Crystal Bridges and we’re glad this Airbnb was available! From the hot tub to the shower to the cozy bed and entertainment system this place is the full package. Would stay again!

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: This is a great place. Most important to me was the comfortable bed and linens. There is of room, and it’s far enough away from the noise of I-49. This place is tucked away, and so much better than a noisy hotel room (and unpredictable “hotel neighbors”) for sure. Quiet, safe area of town and close to major highways. Clean and welcoming place with lots of amenities. Very roomy bathroom, nice shower, mini-kitchen with microwave, dishes, coffee makers and good refrigerator/freezer. The hosts checked on me (by message) every day to make sure I was happy and didn’t need anything. I will stay again if it’s available when I’m in the area. Price was right, which will vary on the time of year, days of the week, etc. I got a good deal for my 4 night stay.

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: Forget something? They’ve got it! Loved everything about this Airbnb from beginning to end. Perfect spot for two. Would stay again in a heart beat

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments:
The space is so cozy and the host is really communicative and helpful. 
The bathroom is worth the stay on it's own. The shower is amazing and they have the softest bath towels of any airbnb that I've stayed in.

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: This was a great stay! Quiet area, extremely clean place, and super comfortable. Communication was efficient and easy as well.

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: No doubt they have provided everything you will need and more. Plenty of snacks, drinks,toiletries and fun surprises. We loved the hot tub with the twinkle lights in the trees. Fun decorations and though it is in a shop it felt very fancy. Amazing host that was attentive but gave us our space. Totally recommend.

listing.name: Rustic digs on acreage with large custom shower!

reviews.comments: Great amenities. Amazing hosts and awesome location!

photos.caption:
Choose rain shower, wand, or both.
Granite and tile throughout.
Assortment of toiletries and essentials if you've forgotten something. Luxury all cotton towels.
600 thread count all cotton sheets and foam over spring mattress for a good nights sleep. Small sofa arms fold down for a cat nap.
Two windows offer ample light. From one window you will overlook the garden and hot tub from the other you would be able to see your car.
Fridge offers a real freezer for ice packs/cubes. Dinette table has integrated bar stools and a folding leaf. Easily converts to desk space. See additional photos.
4K TV swivels for viewing from all angles. TCL Alto sound bar with Bluetooth and subwoofer for streaming your favorite tunes.
Easily convert into work station with supplied monitor and cable along with speedy wi/fi mesh system.

sectionedDescription.access: Private designated parking, simple keypad entry.
sectionedDescription.description:
Peaceful location, Located near the Pinnacle shopping area and XNA airport. 

Overlooks the garden. See photo captions for more detail.

New shower, fully tiled with a large rain shower head. We also have a small sofa that could be suitable for a child sleeping. Laundry available for longer stays. 

Main room includes a sink, decent size refrigerator, microwave and the essentials to prepare simple meals.

An extra room with private entrance could be available, Inquire for more detail.

This space is around 100 feet from the main house, located in a corner of our shop building. Your vehicle will be parked in a private driveway, away from the street. We have room for extra trailer or? Please inquire to accommodate larger or extra vehicles. If you plan a stay longer than a few days we can provide access to Washer/Dryer.

Private designated parking, simple keypad entry.

We are happy to help in anyway we can! Please just let us know and we can make most accommodations. Have lived in the area about 2 years and tried some of the local hot spots. Happy to help with any recommendations!

Located in upscale Cave Springs with nearby access to Shopping, Entertainment, Roger's Convention Center, Walmart Amp, Top Golf along with a plethora of other shopping, eating and entertainment options all under 4 miles away. Easy access to HWY 49 and under 8 miles from WM home office.

Car, Bike or Uber would be the best way to get around. We do not have Bus or mass transit in the vicinity. We have a couple of extra bikes around, geared towards larger/taller people.

Additional space could be available. We have a travel trailer with a queen bed and additional cooking / seating areas, if interested please inquire for photos and details this extra space is not available as a stand alone unit.

Thank You!

name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: I knew the place was large from reading the other reviews, but I was still shocked at the size when I walked in. The place is huge and clean (with a fantastic stand-up shower). I loved relaxing on the deck in the backyard, especially when the host’s husky came up to the deck fence in hope of a head pat or two. Absolutely great stay, I can’t recommend it enough.

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: Clean, spacious, private and set up for anyone to step off a plane or just drive in with a small bag and have anything needed for a comfortable stay. Any personal items you may have forgotten are available in the unit as well as welcome snacks. They thought of everything.  The unit is exactly as pictured. The host quickly responded  to any questions we had and we could not have had a better stay. Great place!! Thank you!

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: Comfortable place, exactly  as advertised.  Easy to cook meals during long term stay in the full kitchen.  Large bed is comfortable.  Twin bed is on soft side. Nice to have different areas to sleep, eat, work, and relax.  Wi-Fi was fast. Would stay again.

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: this place was amazing to stay at!! everything was great quality and it was very roomie! will definitely be back!!

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: Great place! It was super spacious and clean. The hosts were great to communicate with and we would definitely be happy to stay here again.

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: We absolutely loved staying at this Airbnb! It’s in a great central location for exploring NWA. The space is huge, way bigger than what I had expected. You have a great kitchen setup with everything you need if you aren’t a huge fan of eating out. The host was a very chill and kind person that we enjoyed briefly chatting with. Wish we could have gotten to know them even more!! Any issues were quickly resolved and tended to (power outages and running out of cleaning supplies). Would highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone!

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: One of the best Airbnb's I've stayed in! Was there for a month. It was bigger in person than it looked in pictures. Lot's of nice personal touches. High quality cookware! Comfortable main bed and day bed. I could hear pets and people walking upstairs, however it did not bother me and there is an air filter that makes white noise, which also helped to minimize sounds. Great response time to messages! I had several online Zoom interviews during my stay, during which the hosts were very considerate and tried to minimize sounds, and checked in after that it was quiet enough. Overall excellent stay, would definitely recommend!

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: Nice place. Very spacious. Would definitely stay here again!

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: We had another great stay with Joe. Highly recommend his place.  Not our first stay and won't be our last.

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

reviews.comments: Enjoyed my stay! The place was spotless! Hands down one of the best places that I’ve stayed.

listing.name: Private studio apartment: Kitchen, laundry, office

primaryHost.name: Joe

sectionedDescription.access:
You’ll have the entire apartment to yourself including a full kitchen with full-size appliances — refrigerator, oven, stove, microwave, toaster, and basic cookware and dishes. 

The full-size laundry (washer and dryer are in the unit) are free to use. You’ll have your own private parking area and private entrance.

Cameras on the exterior of the property help ensure your safety.
sectionedDescription.description:
Big apartment in a walkout basement on 1 acre in beautiful Cave Springs. Centrally located just minutes from the airport, bike trails, lakes, and shopping.

High ceilings, windows, natural light.

The bedroom (1 queen bed) sleeps 2 people, the twin bed in the living room sleeps 1, and there’s a couch for a 4th person if needed. You’ll have a private, fully loaded kitchen, basic cookware, private laundry, private bathroom, private office and WiFi.

Sorry, we cannot allow pets.

Cave Springs is a high end area with green pastures and quiet neighborhoods, with large yards. On your way in to Cave Springs you're more likely to see pastures and cows than pavement.

We’re in the heart of NorthWest Arkansas; close to downtown Bentonville, close to shopping in Rogers, and only 11 minutes to the airport. Fayetteville is 28 minutes to the south.

You’ll have the entire apartment to yourself including a full kitchen with full-size appliances — refrigerator, oven, stove, microwave, toaster, and basic cookware and dishes. 

The full-size laundry (washer and dryer are in the unit) are free to use. You’ll have your own private parking area and private entrance.

Cameras on the exterior of the property help ensure your safety.

You’ll have a completely private parking area and your own entrance. You might hear the occupants upstairs with a TV on, or occasionally hear the dogs when they get excited. 

Otherwise you’ll enjoy complete privacy because the unit isn’t accessible from inside the main house.

Lots of great dining options in downtown Bentonville or interesting hole in the wall barbecue, burgers, or world cuisine from Indian to Italian. Look at my local guide fir more info.

If you arrive by car you’re welcome to park in the lower parking area. 

Northwest Arkansas has a lot of good coverage with Uber and Lyft. Plan about 10 minutes for an Uber pickup unless it’s peak hours you’ll want to account for more time.

If you have allergies to dogs, or if you’re averse to honey bees, the backyard is home to both. There are 3 operating beehives that produce local honey.

name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: I couldn't have asked for a more perfect stay! Charis home is exactly what I needed! Susan is quick respond to questions. such a kind  & caring host. Iwould not hesitate to!

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: A very comfortable and safe stay for 2 adults. The owner lives in an adjoining home and the cows and donkey are entertaining. Although it’s a drive to get to anything, it is worth the stay. Felt like I was staying with a friend.

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments:
Well, on top of saving for retirement and paying off my mortgage — I now have to find a way to buy a cottage. 

But thanks so much for the inspiration 😄 Sunrises on the front porch and mornings with the birds, waking the lane with my dog… just wonderful.

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: Wonderful spot only 30 min. from Fayetteville. Very homely and just all around good spot to stay in.

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: Thank you for letting us stay here. It was very nice & cozy. We traveled from California, and Susan was very communicative with us. We definitely recommend this cute little place! 100/100

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: this is a truly amazing place to stay. From the value, its comfortable, it's quite and the host are very accommodating.  I highly recommend it

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: My family had a blast in Arkansas for my wedding. I am glad that I booked with Susan just in time because she had a very reasonable price that I couldn’t pass up. My family loves Susan‘s house in the peace and quiet they were filling in her private home. It was very lovely and awesome. And I will tell a lot of people about Susan's home because it was phenomenal. Thank you so much for taking great care of my family and making them feel welcome.

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.response: Thank you so much Dana, they are welcome back anytime!!

reviews.comments: Great experience. Susan is awesome! Communication was easy. Unit was private,  clean, and comfortable. I would definitely stay here again.

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: The most charming cottage style getaway!! Highly recommend!

listing.name: Charis Cottage

reviews.comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The cottage is very clean and comfortable and laid out well. It not only had everything we needed but every single thing I looked for was right where I expected it to be. Although connected to the main house, we still had privacy because of the breezeway between the two. We traveled to NW AR in search of real estate for an upcoming move and enjoyed our stay so much that we’re considering moving to Lowell now, and we’ll definitely stay here on future trips.

primaryHost.about: I work hard as a nurse recruiter so on my vacations I want somewhere like home. I would much rather stay in someone's home than a hotel. I enjoy traveling and meeting new people. I also enjoy reading and gardening. I like places that allow us to decompress, visit with family and just relax. This is what Charis Cottage is all about-relaxation, no worries, and no timelines. Just enjoying nature and the peaceful scenery.
primaryHost.name: Susan

sectionedDescription.access: Entire cottage is yours during your stay, including front porch, back deck and any areas on our 5 acre property you would like to roam.
sectionedDescription.description:
Take a break and unwind at this peaceful cottage. One bedroom with queen bed, one bathroom, (shower only). Lg closet. Full sized, fold out sofa. 
Quiet and serene, the only noise you hear are the cows mooing in distance. 
Close to everything in NWA. Beaver lake is just a few short minutes away. 1 mile to hwy 264, 10 minutes to I-49. 20 mins to UARK,  20 mins to the Amp and Bentonville.  1 hr to Eureka Springs and 2 hrs to Branson!

You will love staying in this clean, quiet, and restful place. It was originally built for the previous owners mother. It’s fully equipped with everything you need, including a  full sized refrigerator, oven, and sink. Plenty of space for your stuff. Visitors love sitting on the porch enjoying the country vibe and watching the beautiful sunrise or sunsets.

Entire cottage is yours during your stay, including front porch, back deck and any areas on our 5 acre property you would like to roam.

We are always available if needed or to answer questions. We live on property in the main part of the house. The cottage and main home are separated by a locked breezeway.

We live in the country, off the beaten path. There are farms and woods all around. However, we are centrally located to  anywhere in NWA.  Well worth it if you want a quiet, relaxing, and safe place to stay.

Car is best, there are a lot of cyclists in the area. The scenic beltway is just a short drive or bike ride away.

We have a one pet policy. 
No smoking please.

primaryHost.about: I'm an Arkansas native that has been in the area most of my life. I manage media production for a sales and marketing agency and enjoy getting back to nature with hiking and mountain biking. I like to travel and am always looking for new places to see.
primaryHost.name: Mark

sectionedDescription.access: Guests will have access to kitchen, living, dining, and laundry rooms. Two parking spots are available in the driveway along with additional street parking.
sectionedDescription.description:
Quiet neighborhood conveniently located 10 minutes from XNA Airport, Pinnacle Hills Promenade shopping area, Walmart AMP (Arkansas Music Pavilion), and many great restaurants. Barn at the Springs and The Creeks Golf Course are just a few minutes down the road along with hiking trails around the Illinois River Watershed Sanctuary. Approximately 20 minutes from Bentonville and Fayetteville.

Great location with comfortable living space and a cozy back deck that overlooks a quiet wooded area. TV in guest room with Apple TV and access to Hulu and Netflix. Help yourself to tea or coffee using the Keurig in the kitchen.

Guests will have access to kitchen, living, dining, and laundry rooms. Two parking spots are available in the driveway along with additional street parking.

I enjoy interacting with guests but am happy to give you space and be available as needed.

I have a friendly three year old Siberian Husky who lives in the house. He will give you a lively welcome but quickly gets used to new friends. He's great with people and usually sleeps or is calm throughout most of the day. He is free to roam around the house but is not allowed in the guest room.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
- Quiet hours after 10pm weekdays and 12am (midnight) on weekends.
- Do not flush anything down the toilet except toilet paper.
- Please do not give any food or treats to my dog, he has food allergies. 
- Please leave the space in the same condition as when you arrived.

name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Where do I begin? Celeste was an AMAZAZING host. This host has a beautiful home, a home away from home. She replies within minutes, checked on us frequently, and made sure we had all supplies and toiletries that we might need. This house is completely furnished with everything you need and lots of extra special touches that make you feel right at home. Absolutely a great location surrounded by restaurants, grocery stores, malls, and easy access to highway and all major streets. Celeste is a very accommodating and caring host. We booked with her after having a house fire, and she made sure we were taken care of. She made my family of 6 feel right at home, and for this, I will always be so thankful. I, without a doubt, will be recommending her and her Airbnb to all my friends and family.

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Celeste’s Airbnb was everything we hoped for and more. Immaculately clean and stylish. Spacious, comfortable bedrooms and bathrooms with thoughtful touches. The home was in a quiet neighborhood with good access and proximity to restaurants and local attractions. Being able to park in the garage was a big plus, and the laundry room was great, too. We would be glad to stay again anytime!

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Very clean, nice and spacious. Close to restaurants, and not far from beaver lake!

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Great house and so convenient to everything. Right in the middle between Bentonville and Fayetteville. Super cozy house. Celeste was awesome.

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Fantastic host with great hospitality.  House was very clean and in a great location; just minutes from everything!  Celeste was very responsive and helpful leading up to and during our stay - making sure things were just right.  Would stay here again with no hesitation. A great place for a reasonable price.  Well done!

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Fantastic stay! Thank you Celeste

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: This place was perfect for our family of 5. Or more. Loads of space. Super close to 49 so great access to NWA attractions. The owners/ hosts were fantastic. They literally bend over backwards to make sure guests are taken care of. The first night we got there  we could not get TV to act right so They sent someone over at 8:30 at night to fix it. Turned out the remote just needed batteries. They insisted they go get some that night even after I told them it wasn’t a big deal. We have been all over and this was one of the bests hosts we have had. Can’t brag on them enough.

listing.name: Convenient to I-49 Cozy Home

reviews.comments: Celeste was super accommodating and made sure we had everything we needed! Plenty of space and we had a great stay.

reviews.comments: Wonderful reasonably priced home. Very clean! Relaxing place for a busy family wedding weekend

reviews.comments: beautiful place, friendly host, very helpful on all questions asked of them. very clean had everything we needed and greatprice.  would recommend this place to anyone and we will stay there again.

Beautiful newly remodeled home with all new decor located in a quiet established neighborhood right off the Lowell exit of I-49. This is the center of Northwest Arkansas and is convenient to all of the area attractions such as the AMP, Crystal Bridges Museum,  University of Arkansas and all of the area trails and outdoor adventures. You will enjoy the entire place with a 2 car garage to park your vehicles in to keep out of the weather. Fully furnished kitchen for all your cooking needs.

You can utilize all the house and the garage during your stay.

No pets or smoking on the premises.

primaryHost.about: I live in Arkansas with my husband and his daughter. We frequently travel for leisure and quick getaways. We hope to host you at our home soon!

sectionedDescription.access: This home has 3 bedrooms and two full baths, a very nice size living room, kitchen and dining area with a coffee station.
sectionedDescription.description:
Welcome to our New Hope House! Soak up vintage charm of this newly renovated home in a prime location! Minutes away from the lively old historic downtown. Just 4 miles to the Pinnacle Mall and dining options there, the Walmart AMP theater, and Top Golf. Only 2.5 miles to the Railyard Park and Lake Atalanta. Just 9 miles to Bentonville and  many biking trails there. Easy access to the I-49.

Our home is a corner lot with on site parking and one garage for your vehicle. Keyless entry will be set up just for you. Feel free to park your boat in the driveway if you have one. We are close to Beaver Lake.

This home has 3 bedrooms and two full baths, a very nice size living room, kitchen and dining area with a coffee station.

Everything gets sanitized between each guest. Just call or text if you need anything at all.

Rogers is a lovely town with many events and things to do. World class cuisine is offered from every price level and are very convenient to get to. Bike riding trails and walking trails are extremely popular and easy to get to, also.

You can use your vehicle, or hire drivers from Uber or other ride sharing services. New Hope is a main road through town so it's really convenient to get around.

The outlets and kitchen cabinets are not set up to be child proof. Please use caution if you bring infants or toddlers.

The house is centrally located close to all the major attractions in NWA. We provide a relaxing and clean place to stay.

Guests love staying with us because of the value we offer. It's close to everything and it is clean and private.

Guests may use the kitchen, living room, garage and the backyard.

Our co-host, Eva, lives on site to assist but all contact is preferred through the Airbnb app.

It's centrally located, close to all major attractions.

Cars, taxi and rideshare.

Being close to the main road, there is potential for noise.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
-Be respectful to the co-host living on-site
-No excessive drinking allowed
-Quiet hours after 10 pm
-Must do the dishes after use
-Do not make the bed before check-out/do not strip the bed/leave the bed as-is
-Leave used towels hanging in the bathroom
-Park in the driveway on the left side facing the garage
-Do not access the shed/area
-Do not open the gates to the backyard

CHECK-OUT INSTRUCTIONS
-Check-out time is 10 AM
-Leave your room key in your room on the bedside table
-Lock the front door deadbolt behind you by pressing “Brinks”
-Send the host a message once you've checked out
-Check-out means vacating the property, not just your room

primaryHost.about:
Hello!

My name is Jacob!  I own and operate Native Host, a Northwest Arkansas based short-term rental company.  I am passionate about creating homes, spaces and experiences that give our guests an opportunity to stay like a native and live like a local. Our stays are geared towards families, business travelers and adventure seekers - looking to make themselves at home and comfortable during their time in NWA.  


See you soon!
primaryHost.name: Jacob

sectionedDescription.access: The Neighbor’s Nest is one of several high quality properties in Northwestern Arkansas hosted by the Native Host team. Stay here or in any of their homes, and you can expect a polite and professional service at all times, as the team will do all they can to ensure you enjoy the best of what real life in real neighborhoods in Northwest Arkansas has to offer. You’ll be able to contact the team using the Airbnb app or via direct texts and messages to the number you’ll be provided with when you confirm your booking. The house will be exclusively yours for the duration of your reservation, and you will have access to all areas of the house - only a cleaner’s closet in the hall is out of bounds.
sectionedDescription.description:
Ready to enjoy all that Northwest Arkansas has to offer? The Neighbor’s Nest is situated conveniently in the middle of all the action and gives you plenty of space to call your own. From the thoughtful interior design to the luxe hotel bedding and mattresses, you’ll find this home recharges your batteries for whatever your day may bring.

Summary: 

3 Bedroom Craftsman Style Home
Sleeps 6
1900 Sq ft of space
Located close to Pinnacle Hills 
Easy and secure parking in garage
Large and open living area 
Easy drive to Bentonville and Springdale
Master bedroom features impressive ensuite
Brooklinen Luxe Core Bedding
Premium Mattresses by Helix
Samsumg Smart TV in Living Room
Book your stay today!

Living Room

The large, open living room space provides a meeting space for your entire group. Whether you want to map out your plans for the upcoming day or enjoy a movie night in, this place is perfect for you. Above the gas fireplace featured is a Samsung 65 inch smart TV.  

Kitchen & Dining

The open concept kitchen allows you to watch TV in the living room while you cook. The kitchen is equipped to handle all your needs. There is a bar with seating for four as well as a large dining table with seating for six. 

Three Bedrooms
Whichever bedroom you get at the Neighbor’s Nest, you’ll enjoy the benefits of a comfortable mattress and Brooklinen Luxe Core bedding. So you can be fully relaxed and ready for a new day’s adventurie in Northwest Arkansas. 

The Master features a king size bed by Helix Mattress, together with a lounge area that includes a 55-inch smart TV, plus an ensuite bathroom with jacuzzi tub, shower, and double vanity.

The other two bedrooms feature a queen size bed. One of which has a 55” Roku Smart TV. The other bedroom has an attached Jack-and-Jill bath and office area which is great if you’re working from home!

2.5 Bathrooms
The downstairs features a half bath underneath the stairs, while the upstairs has a guest bathroom in the hall with a Jack-and-Jill door to one of the bedrooms. The upstairs hall bath has a large shower with a rainforest showerhead. 

You can expect to find good quality shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, hand soap and hair dryers in these bathrooms for all guests to use.


Laundry 
All that adventuring tends to get clothes a little dirty. So it’s good to know you can wash and dry your favorites easily in the nest’s separate laundry area.

The Neighbor’s Nest is one of several high quality properties in Northwestern Arkansas hosted by the Native Host team. Stay here or in any of their homes, and you can expect a polite and professional service at all times, as the team will do all they can to ensure you enjoy the best of what real life in real neighborhoods in Northwest Arkansas has to offer. You’ll be able to contact the team using the Airbnb app or via direct texts and messages to the number you’ll be provided with when you confirm your booking. The house will be exclusively yours for the duration of your reservation, and you will have access to all areas of the house - only a cleaner’s closet in the hall is out of bounds.

There are many great reasons to book a stay at the Neighbor’s Nest, not least because it gives you a taste of what life’s like living in a real Northwest Arkansas neighborhood. The location gives you great access to the local biking and hiking trails. And it’s ideal for anyone here working- Walmart Home Office and JB Hunt are only 6 miles away, and Tyson Global Headquarters are less than a 15 minute drive . 

Here are some other attractions close by your crew might want to check out:

Walmart AMP Venue (2.7 miles away)

Pinnacle Hills (2.5 miles away) 

Mercy Health (3 miles away)

Crystal Bridges Museum of American (8 miles away)

The Momentary (7 miles away)

Downtown Rogers (9 miles away)

Bentonville Square  (7 miles away)
sectionedDescription.name: NEW The Neighbor's Nest Near Pinnacle Hills

primaryHost.about: After having great success with our event venue, Barn at the Springs, we wanted to add a cottage to offer our clients and the public a beautiful,relaxing place to stay. After 35 years in healthcare, I am loving offering hospitality to NWA.
primaryHost.name: Kim

sectionedDescription.access: Guests have full access to the house and barn.
sectionedDescription.description:
Cottage at the Springs is a quaint bungalow built in 1927 five minutes from XNA. It's completely remodeled and decorated in an eclectic style with ship lap throughout. The cottage has two bedrooms and a full bath with an artisan crafted shower. The kitchen includes granite counter tops and brand new full sized appliances. Our sunroom, situated on a large corner lawn, overlooks a small traditional "red" barn with covered patio and fire pit ,perfect for entertaining and enjoying an Ozark evening.

The Cottage has an adorable barn in the back yard with a shiplap space for entertaining as well as an outdoor fire pit with built in seating.

Guests have full access to the house and barn.

We also have an event - wedding venue five minutes from the Cottage. We are available 24/7 by phone or in person if needed.

Bentonville-XNA Airport-Crystal Bridges-Parks-Great location.

Guests may use car, uber or taxi. We have ample paved parking at the Cottage.

The cottage is smack dad in the middle of the "best of the best" in northwest Arkansas. You are minutes away from Fayetteville, Springdale, Bentonville, Crystal Bridges Art Museum, AMP concert venue, XNA airport, and University of Arkansas. Top notch restaurants and entertainment spots are virtually five minutes from the cottage.

sectionedDescription.description:
Enjoy your stay at SteamPunk Station! This is a 3 bed, 2 bath industrial-themed home located in the heart of NWA. We are close to the interstate making you minutes away from the Walmart AMP, Top Golf, the Pinnacle Dining, entertainment, shopping mall, museums, parks and much more! If you get lucky, you’ll see why we are called “The Station” and hear the Choochoos. We look forward to hosting you!

Welcome to our newly remodeled industrial-themed home! The SteamPunk Station is 3 bed, 2  bath home that gives a luxurious and antique feel while being comfortably furnished. Make yourself at home and relax in the living room cozied up by the fireplace. Want to have a movie night in? We have streaming entertainment all set up for you to watch. Enjoy a home cooked meal using the supplied kitchen with pots, pans, cooking and baking ware, Tupperware and everything you may need. You can store refrigerated items or left overs in the new Stainless steel Samsung fridge. You’ll find many options in our coffee + tea station. In the living room there is a desk area that allows you to get any work done. We have also provided a work out station with basic equipment. The fenced backyard offers a deck with seating area to sip your morning coffee or enjoy those evening drinks.

Each bedroom offers a plush mattress that will have you wanting to sleep in! Since we are close to the train tracks, we provide earplugs and sound machines for you to be able to do so. You’ll find a King size bed in the Master Suite and a Queen bed in each of the other 2 bedrooms. We have 2 cots available upon request for any extra guests. 

You will find 2 full bathrooms. The Master suite has it’s own private bathroom while the other bathroom is located in the hallway. Both bathrooms are stocked with towels and toiletries. 

Forget something? We are fully stocked with any basic needs you may have. Host is nearby and available. We hope to make your stay a memorable one!

You’ll have an effortless self check-in by using your own personalized code on the smart lock. Code will be provided with check-in instructions. 

Guests are welcome to use the driveway for parking their vehicles. Be aware of the No Parking Fire Lanes at the street. Garage is off-limits to guests. 

Host is accessible for any needs throughout the stay.

Host is available for any need that arises during your stay.

sectionedDescription.description:
Our new home hosts an upscale king bedroom, private bath with double sinks, and a separate LR room to watch TV and relax. The king size bed will soothe you to sleep with a luxurious Tempur-pedic mattress.  Can we say location? Less than 5 miles to retail shopping, Top Golf, Walmart AMP, unlimited restaurants, and close to World-Renowned bike trails.   Parking on site. Co-host has Suoerhost rating for her other listing. Included- Mini Fridge/Freezer and microwave for your convenience!

This Upscale Private bedroom, living room and bathroom are in a brand new home.  Everything is new.  Incredibly soft carpet will cushion your feet.   This is not like just renting a private room.  You get that  as well as a LR too.  It is perfect place to get away or travel for work.  It is very quiet!  Take a walk in our safe neighborhood that has abundant street lighting.

Parking is a breeze.  You will have two spots right in front of our third stall garage door.  If you want to Uber or Lyft NWA offers that as well!

Craftsman Style Homes Neighborhood

Parking is free and we have parking in the driveway.  Also Uber and Lyft are available.

reviews.comments: My 3 month stay at Diana’s place was perfect. Everything met or exceeded expectations. She was a great host with a wonderful family. I appreciated the recommendations for places to go in the area! Cannot say anything bad about my experience staying here!

listing.name: Private room near popular destinations & 49

reviews.comments: Perfect stay for a couple. Isolated private room upstairs.

listing.name: Private room near popular destinations & 49

reviews.comments:
My teen daughters and I were very comfortable during our two-weeks at the host's house.  It is located in a nice community with wide, quiet streets and we regularly took pleasant walks in the mornings and evenings.   The guest room you stay in is located upstairs.  Guests have a private bathroom and a big TV in the room. The queen bed is comfortable, the air conditioning powerful and she provided two  mattresses for my daughters to sleep on.

The shared areas downstairs are very spacious. Guests have full access to the modern kitchen, washer/dryer and living room area which is very comfortable to hang out in.   She has a big 65" TV mounted and we spent a lot of time lounging around watching movies and reading. There is a treadmill and exercise area that she let me use, lots of boardgames to play with and in the backyard she has another mounted TV with a comfortable and shaded seating area.     

The host lives in the house and works from home, but mostly keeps to herself.  If I ever had a question or needed anything I could just text her and she'd immediately respond and accommodate me.  She is pleasant to speak with and helpful.

Overall we we're very pleased with the stay and we would definitely stay there again.

primaryHost.about: Mom of two beautiful smart children. Busy career so our vacations are to reconnect and slow down.  Long time resident of Arkansas but raised in Florida & New England and a few years out west so I have had the pleasure of living in most regions of the US. I Airbnb on vacation so as a customer on both sides I try to make my guests feel welcome and at home.
primaryHost.name: Diana

sectionedDescription.access:
Bathrooms off hall in main living areas plus your private bathroom. Laundry, kitchen, living room, fitness equipment and patio.

Free parking on right side of driveway. A garage parking spot is available for an extra fee. 

Security system and cameras enabled at front door and in living room. 

Hot Tub for registered guest only. No use for children. Use at your own risk.
sectionedDescription.description:
*3% city tax if booking is less than 30 days which is assessed after booking through a payment request.
Long term or relocating guests welcome. Your private bedroom & bathroom is located in a quiet area but centrally located to popular destinations. The room & home is in a modern style.

The room: queen bed & chair that folds out for a child. A queen air mattress avail; private bathroom w/ shower. 60” TV w/ Roku & a table, chair in bedroom. Public areas: living room, kitchen, laundry, & patio.

A Keurig & French Press is available in the kitchen and a hot tea selection. Help yourself to any fresh fruit, bread, butter, spices and cooking oils in the kitchen. Extra toiletries are provided in your private bath. Use of balls, and tennis/badminton racquets in garage are permitted.
If you are in need of any forgotten essential let me know and I will accommodate if I can.

Hot Tub for registered guest only. No use for children. Use at your own risk.

I am often working late but available either in my home office or via text/call. 

If I am traveling I will let you know because availability is more limited with global time zones.

Crystal bridges 7 miles

Donald W. Reynolds Razorback Stadium 20 miles

Uber and taxis available

photos.caption: Our front porch is 8 feet deep and covered.  The dual bench with a table in the middle is great for morning coffee, afternoon tea/cocktail/conversation, and even quiet and comfortable in the evening before you retire for the night.
Corner sectional converts to a queen sized bed.  See pictures below.
Large open living room.  The skylight windows and soft coloring create a dreamy relaxing atmosphere. Lots of windows with light filtering shades.
Watch for the lamp post, to identify our driveway
55" TV, Books, board games, kids games and books.
Seating for 4 at the table, plus 2 barstools at the counter.  Comfy padding on the seats!

Wide Galley Kitchen with granite counter tops.
Samsung appliances. Dawn dish soap and Cascade cubes for the dishwasher under the sink.
Full kitchen with dishwasher, washer and dryer. Coffee, (Keurig and Kcups) tea and bottled water provided. Also, protein bars, oatmeal and popcorn for those who get 'hangry' after a long trip.

Full size washer and dryer.
Tide pod and Bounce fabric softener sheet provided.

King Size bed with memory foam mattress, and 100% cotton, 800 TC sheets.
Lamps on either side of the bed have USB ports on the back of the base for conveniently charging your cell phone or tablet.
Room Darkening shades in the bedroom.
Large closet in the bedroom with shelving and an second suitcase rack.

Spacious bathroom with separate room for tub/toilet.  Lots of towels, super soft rugs.
Hair dryer, razor, toothbrush and toothpaste.
Also, there is a basket of cleaning cloths under the sink.
Double sinks for convenience and a large counter top.
Storage for bedding for sleeper sofa.
Bottom pulls out on wheels.

primaryHost.about:
Nana’s Place was actually built for Todd’s mom, Nana (Mary Carolyn) Butler, whose health was failing. The plan was to ‘eventually’ turn it into an Air BnB for extra income when we retire.  She was really looking forward to being closer to family and we were looking forward to having her closer. Unfortunately, she passed away before the houses were completed, so we decided to commemorate her and name our Air BnB, Nana’s Place. Nana was always one to see the good and the positive in any situation, and we have tried to foster that outlook in our decorating. We’ve blended some of her favorite things with amenities that, for us at least, encourage positive thinking.

We both thoroughly enjoy Northwest Arkansas. Having moved here separately in 1991, we have watched the area grow and flourish during that time. We met in 2004, and the rest, as they say “is history”. We enjoy riding motorcycles (I’m just a passenger:), hiking, plays, museums, history, boating, music, fishing, being outdoors...just about anything that is readily prevalent in Northeast Arkansas, and realize that we are blessed to be here.

We are fortunate to have most of our family close, and enjoy big gatherings and holidays with our kids, their kids and our siblings. We have three children between us and I have a step son that we consider our own. We also have 6 incredible grandkids via our beautiful children! Nana also was passionate about her grandkids. We’ve tried to make our space very kid friendly with high chair, books, plastic cups, etc.
primaryHost.name: Liz

sectionedDescription.access: There is space for 2 cars on the driveway and also street parking.
sectionedDescription.description:
Relax with the whole family at this peaceful place with a great room so you can see the whole family. 

Our modest Lakewood home in Lowell was built August 2021 so it is brand new, fresh and clean.

All the bedding were purchased Dec 2021. The sheets and towels are all organic cotton. 

The cleaning supplies we use are free of petro-chemicals.  The kitchen is well stocked with stainless steel pots and glass baking pans and storage containers.

There is an electric hot water kettle to make your tea and a Keurig coffee maker.

Lake towels in the pantry for you to take on your outings. 

Lowell is centrally located between Bentonville and Fayetteville. 

8 minutes to Pinnacle Hills Promenade, the mall in Rogers.

12 minutes to XNA

4 minutes to Harps, the closest supermarket

8 minutes to Walmart Supercenter in Rogers

5 minutes to Matrix Racket Club for your tennis, pickle ball and padel players. They also have a spin and lifting room. 

8 minutes to the AMP (Arkansas Music Pavilion)

There is space for 2 cars on the driveway and also street parking.

Linda, the property manager is available when needed.

New Development 4 minutes to the 49
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
A $30 per person additional charge will apply for guests above the reserved/registered number. 

Only registered guests are allowed on the property. Parties are not allowed. Limited day guests allowed but no overnight guests beyond the number of people reserved. There is a camera in the front and back doors. There will be a fee for overnight visitors.

QUIET Time between 10pm and 8am. 

DISHES: Please wash all dishes before you depart.

TRASH: Please take out trash regularly. There is a large bin outside.
Garbage is collected Thursday mornings. Please take bins to the street before 7AM THURSDAYS or after 6pm Wednesday nights.

AC/Heat:  Please set Central Heat to 70 when you go out for the day. At 65 before checking out.

Please no eating in bedrooms.

Please be careful with the furniture. Any damages will incur a fee. Please no shoes on the furniture (sofa, beds, tables, etc). 

This is also our home. Some of us are allergic to smoke, pets and strong scents. We try to use all natural cleaning supplies like vinegar, hydrogen peroxide and chemical free products which are all available at our home.

primaryHost.about:
As a resident of Bella Vista and small business owner, I know and love all that the Ozarks have to offer. From the numerous bike trails to the restaurant and art scene to the hiking opportunities, Northwest Arkansas boasts the perfect mix of city and outdoor activities.

As a mother to 4 girls, it’s important to me that our locations welcome families and couples alike. My attention to detail in the realms of hospitality and design will make you feel at ease and comfortable while visiting our gem of a region. We go the extra mile to include unexpected touches that make your stay more comfortable and unique to build memories in the heart of the Ozarks. Explore nature, ride the trails, bar hop, and shop local boutiques, but then come to relax at our comfortable and clean homes.

Don’t hesitate to reach out for area recommendations or special requests.
primaryHost.name: Stephanie

sectionedDescription.access:
The apartment is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home. 

Other than the already mentioned amenities, our home is also equipped with:

✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Air Conditioning
✔ Heating
✔ Laundry Room with Washer/Dryer
✔ Iron/ Board
✔ Free Garage Parking
sectionedDescription.description:
Unwind at the stylish and comfy 2BR 2.5Bath home nestled in the family-friendly neighborhood of Rogers, AR. Its prime location allows you to explore all Northwest Arkansas has to offer, including the popular AMP venue, which is just a short 5-min drive away, making this retreat a perfect base to see your favorite band or comedian. 

✔ 2 Comfortable BRs /w Queen Beds
✔ Open Design Living
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ Private Patio
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Free Parking

Learn more below!

A blend of comfort, style, and convenience greets you as soon as you step inside this charming two-level home. While decorating this inviting retreat, we have worked hard to create a "2nd home" feeling for our guests. 

The ground floor living area is the home's focal point, successfully combining the lively living room with an inviting dining area adjacent to the fully equipped kitchen. Large windows and patio doors allow for plenty of natural light to illuminate the space throughout the day. Together with the bright tiled floors and tasteful décor, create a feeling of elegance and coziness.

Two highly comfortable bedrooms are designed to offer all the rest you need after a long day of roaming through the scenic state of Arkansas!

★ LIVING ROOM ★
Enjoy in this inviting and comfortable setting where you will have everything needed to relax in complete serenity. If you need to attend work or a remote learning session, we have prepared a work desk to satisfy all your business needs.

✔ Stylish and Comfy Sofa with Pillows and Blankets
✔ Smart TV	
✔ Coffee Table
✔ Reading Lights
✔ Work desk with a Chair
✔ Access to Private Patio

★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
Even the most demanding of chefs would enjoy preparing delicious meals using numerous modern cooking appliances. In addition, spacious granite countertops provide plenty of workspaces for you to prepare delicious homemade delicacies while extending into a bar where you can enjoy a couple of drinks while the food is getting ready.

✔ Microwave
✔ Stove
✔ Oven
✔ Refrigerator/Freezer with Water Dispenser
✔ Dishwasher
✔ Coffee Maker
✔ Toaster
✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water
✔ Trays
✔ Glasses
✔ Silverware
✔ Pots & Pans
✔ Pantry

The charming dining area is situated right next to the kitchen. 

✔ Dining Table with Seating for 4
✔ Kitchen Bar with Seating for 2

★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS - 2 BEDROOMS ★
Two tastefully furnished bedrooms on the upper floor are designed to provide hotel-like comfort and convenience needed to relax and rest so you can remain energized and do everything you have planned the next day.

♛ Bedroom 1

✔ Queen-Size Bed with Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
✔ Walk-In Closet with Hangers and Shelves
✔ Night Stand with a Reading Lamp
✔ Ensuite Bathroom with a Tub + Shower

♛ Bedroom 2

✔ Queen-Size Bed with Pillows, Linens, and Sheets
✔ Work Desk
✔ Closet with Hangers and Shelves
✔ Night Stand with a Reading Lamp
✔ Ensuite Bathroom with a Tub + Shower

★ BATHROOMS ★
Both bedrooms on the upper floor come with inviting ensuite bathrooms, stocked with all essential toiletries for your maximum convenience. The ground floor features a half bath, so you don't have to make any unnecessary trips upstairs.

✔ Bathtub with a Shower
✔ Vanity
✔ Mirror
✔ Toilet
✔ Towels
✔ Hair Dryer
✔ Essential Toiletries

★ PATIO ★
Enjoy the sunny outdoor ambiance of the private patio from which you can gaze at the well-maintained lawn and the lovely neighborhood surrounding it.

✔ Outdoor Seating Area with Table and Chairs

Look no further than our serene home for your memorable visit to Rogers, AR. We are looking forward to you experiencing it in its complete comfort and coziness.

The apartment is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home. 

Other than the already mentioned amenities, our home is also equipped with:

✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Air Conditioning
✔ Heating
✔ Laundry Room with Washer/Dryer
✔ Iron/ Board
✔ Free Garage Parking

We will be accessible 24/7 for our guests via phone, text, or the Airbnb app. 
Expect a quick and prompt response. We give our guests space but are available for every inquiry. 

Door code, information, and Wi-Fi info will be sent before check-in.

Contact us now so we can begin arranging your perfect vacation!

The house is nestled in a tranquil, family-friendly neighborhood in Rogers, AR, close to the popular AMP, a concert venue that regularly attracts A-list musicians and comedians. This well-connected location is perfect for everyone who would like to explore everything northwest Arkansas has to offer.

Here are some attractions you will be looking to visit during your stay.

✔ Arkansas Music Pavilion (5 min away)
✔ Walmart Corporate Headquarters (10 min away)
✔ Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art (15 min away)
✔ Botanical Gardens (25 min away)
✔ Northwest Arkansas National Airport (25 min away)
✔ Razorback Stadium (30 min away)
✔ Bud Walton Arena (35 min away)
✔ The University of Arkansas (35 min away)

***Distance times are calculated if traveling by car.

If you arrive by car, you will be happy to know that there is plenty of parking in the garage. If driving is something you would like to avoid during your stay, there are many convenient, easily accessible transportation options close to our home.

✔ Car Rental
✔ Bicycles
✔ Buses
✔ Taxis
✔ Both Lyft & UBER operate in the area

★ ADDITIONAL ACCOMMODATION ★
If you are traveling in a larger group or preferred dates are taken, you'll be happy to know that we offer additional accommodation in the city. Feel free to browse our profile for a detailed list.

★ COVID-19 SANITIZATION ★
Heath, safety, and wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reason, we use a thorough process of cleaning after each check-out.

★ IMPORTANT ★

Our properties are protected by SUPERHOG, the digital trust platform that enables Hosts, Operators and Guests to confidently transact in the short-term rentals space.
 
Please note that once you have booked, you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself. Please make sure this is completed  prior to check-in.

sectionedDescription.space:
A blend of comfort, style, and convenience greets you as soon as you step inside this charming two-level home. While decorating this inviting retreat, we have worked hard to create a "2nd home" feeling for our guests. 

The ground floor living area is the home's focal point, successfully combining the lively living room with an inviting dining area adjacent to the fully equipped kitchen. Large windows and patio doors allow for plenty of natural light to illuminate the space throughout the day. Together with the bright tiled floors and tasteful décor, create a feeling of elegance and coziness.

Two highly comfortable bedrooms are designed to offer all the rest you need after a long day of roaming through the scenic state of Arkansas!

★ LIVING ROOM ★
Enjoy in this inviting and comfortable setting where you will have everything needed to relax in complete serenity. If you need to attend work or a remote learning session, we have prepared a work desk to satisfy all your business needs.

✔ Stylish and Comfy Sofa with Pillows and Blankets
✔ Smart TV	
✔ Coffee Table
✔ Reading Lights
✔ Work desk with a Chair
✔ Access to Private Patio

★ KITCHEN & DINING ★
Even the most demanding of chefs would enjoy preparing delicious meals using numerous modern cooking appliances. In addition, spacious granite countertops provide plenty of workspaces for you to prepare delicious homemade delicacies while extending into a bar where you can enjoy a couple of drinks while the food is getting ready.

✔ Microwave

The charming dining area is situated right next to the kitchen. 

✔ Dining Table with Seating for 4

★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS - 2 BEDROOMS ★
Two tastefully furnished bedrooms on the upper floor are designed to provide hotel-like comfort and convenience needed to relax and rest so you can remain energized and do everything you have planned the next day.

additionalHosts.about:
As a University of Arkansas Law School Alum, Fayetteville holds fonds memories of collegiate spirit and academic pursuit. Having moved on to New Haven, Connecticut, where I am currently pursuing a Master of Divinity degree at Yale University, I recently decided to provide a haven for others visiting and experiencing Northwest Arkansas’s unique opportunities. 

As a former Wal-Mart lawyer and JAG officer in the Air Force, my goal is to ensure every need and comfort is provided for guests traveling and staying at the cottage. Well-versed in the area’s offerings and connected to the community, don’t hesitate to ask questions and reach out for recommendations on what to do and where to go. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
additionalHosts.name: Richard

listing.name: Serendipity House

reviews.comments: The house is beautiful, spotless, and well organized.  Melissa has thought of everything to make your stay perfect. Communication was great - responses were immediate. I cannot recommend this place enough.

listing.name: Serendipity House

reviews.comments: The only reason this stay is rated 5 stars is because we couldn't give it 10 stars.  Everything was perfect.  Great communication and clear instructions prior to check-in and the house far exceeded our expectations.  Very, very clean and spacious.  Host was extremely helpful and gracious.  Anytime our travels take us to Northwest Arkansas in the future, this will be the first place we check for availability!

listing.name: Serendipity House

reviews.comments: I booked this house a few months ago for me and my bridesmaids to get ready the night before our wedding and I honestly don’t think we could have picked a better booking for our special occasion. Melissa was an incredibly gracious host who went above and beyond to make sure we had a a amazing time. I will tell everyone who will listen that they need to stay with her. I even told my husband that this would be an awesome place for a quick staycation. Don’t look anywhere else if you need to book a stay in NWA!

listing.name: Serendipity House

reviews.comments:
This was our first Airbnb experience and now we’re hooked. This house was clean and in a beautiful neighborhood. Melissa did a great job of making sure we felt at home while staying. She had thought of every detail including extra toiletries just in case we forgot something. She also had fresh OJ, milk, eggs, several kinds of breads/bagels and pretty much anything to keep your belly full. I have heard that not all Airbnb’s are like this so I just can’t say enough about how grateful we are with this experience. 
Melissa, Thank you from our whole family for making this a five star+ experience for us. We will definitely be recommending your home to any other friends and family.

primaryHost.about: I have been a Store Manager for Starbucks for 17 years.  I absolutely love what I do and love building relationships with my customers.  I am a mom of 2 teenagers that bring joy to my life!  If I didn't have to work, I would travel from one end of the country to the other, making sure to stop at local restaurants and historical markers all along the way.  I have loved being an AirBnB host!  I have a sevants' heart and have loved being a part of making your friends and family events special.
primaryHost.name: Melissa

sectionedDescription.access:
The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need for cooking including pots, pans, crock pot, etc.  There is enough serveware to accommodate more than 10 guests.  You will have full access to all that is in the refrigerator, pantry and spice rack.

The living room, as well as the Master bedroom and the big room upstairs, has a 48' - 52 " television.  There is also a smart blu-ray dvd player in each of those rooms that have the option of Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime.  The living room also has Apple TV.  I DO NOT HAVE CABLE so these are your only options.   If you hope to watch live events that you are not able to stream on an iPhone and airdrop to Apple TV, you will need to go to a sports bar.

The Master Bedroom has a queen size, super comfortable, adjustable base bed with premium bedding.  The Master Bathroom has a deep jacuzzi tub that presents a spa-like atmosphere.  The shower has dual heads and can fit 2 people.

There are 2 bedrooms upstairs that each have 2 queen beds with premium bedding.  The big room also has a king size bed.  I will warn you that it is a very firm bed so choose your bed wisely.  There is also a couch and a floor cushion that could reasonably sleep 2 smaller people.  I also have a queen size air mattress which is brand new that has a built in air pump for use if necessary.  This is in the closet of the big room.  There is an additional comforter in the closet as well and additional linens in the linen closet to the right of the laundry room.

There is one full bathroom upstairs with a shower/tub combo and an additional full bathroom downstairs off the kitchen.

Guests have access to laundry facilities that is well equipped with all clothes washing needs.

I do provide shampoo/conditioner, body wash, soap and a few extras that may surprise you!!!

Please read my reviews!!!!  You will not be sorry you booked my home for your stay in Northwest Arkansas!!!!  I am very passionate about creating a very comfortable environment that goes above and beyond my guests expectations.
sectionedDescription.description:
In efforts to minimize the spread of Covid-19 PARTIES AND EVENTS ARE NOT ALLOWED!

Welcome to Serendipity House.  My home is in a very wonderful craftsman-style neighborhood .  My home is only 5 years old and has beautiful finishes throughout.   

My home is close to:
Bike Trails
Beaver Lake
Walmart Home Office
Walmart AMP
Crystal Bridges
Tyson
JB Hunt
University of Arkansas. 

My place is good for couples, families, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  I am a pet friendly home.

My home is very centrally located to most destinations and pet friendly.  I have a very large fenced in backyard for pets to run.  There will be an additional cleaning fee of $25 for each pet.  

There are 3 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms that will be available for all guests.  You will have everything you could possibly need for your stay.

The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need for cooking including pots, pans, crock pot, etc.  There is enough serveware to accommodate more than 10 guests.  You will have full access to all that is in the refrigerator, pantry and spice rack.

The living room, as well as the Master bedroom and the big room upstairs, has a 48' - 52 " television.  There is also a smart blu-ray dvd player in each of those rooms that have the option of Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime.  The living room also has Apple TV.  I DO NOT HAVE CABLE so these are your only options.   If you hope to watch live events that you are not able to stream on an iPhone and airdrop to Apple TV, you will need to go to a sports bar.

The Master Bedroom has a queen size, super comfortable, adjustable base bed with premium bedding.  The Master Bathroom has a deep jacuzzi tub that presents a spa-like atmosphere.  The shower has dual heads and can fit 2 people.

There are 2 bedrooms upstairs that each have 2 queen beds with premium bedding.  The big room also has a king size bed.  I will warn you that it is a very firm bed so choose your bed wisely.  There is also a couch and a floor cushion that could reasonably sleep 2 smaller people.  I also have a queen size air mattress which is brand new that has a built in air pump for use if necessary.  This is in the closet of the big room.  There is an additional comforter in the closet as well and additional linens in the linen closet to the right of the laundry room.

There is one full bathroom upstairs with a shower/tub combo and an additional full bathroom downstairs off the kitchen.

Guests have access to laundry facilities that is well equipped with all clothes washing needs.

I do provide shampoo/conditioner, body wash, soap and a few extras that may surprise you!!!

Please read my reviews!!!!  You will not be sorry you booked my home for your stay in Northwest Arkansas!!!!  I am very passionate about creating a very comfortable environment that goes above and beyond my guests expectations.

I do my best to meet with guests but will not always be available to do so.  You will have the entire home to yourself but I am very close to be able to assist with any needs.  If you have allergies to pets, please be aware that I do have indoor pets but they will not be in the home during your stay and they do not shed so you will not have to deal with fur.

The neighborhood is a very quiet, close knit family community.  All homes tend to watch out for each other.  With that said, please be respectful of noise level.   80% of the families have very young children.  

My neighborhood has a very vocal POA.  If the noise level is too loud or vehicles are parked blocking the sidewalk, they will either call me or the Cave Springs police department as well as fine me.  If this occurs, you will be charged the fee for the fine.

As always, Uber is the best way to get around if you don't have your own vehicle or you plan to partake in excessive adult beverage consumption.  My home is 2.8 miles from I-49 on a road with a 25 mile per hour speed limit.  It will take about 5-7 minutes to get to the interstate.

In efforts to minimize the spread of Covid 19, PARTIES AND LARGE GATHERINGS ARE NOT ALLOWED!

You must be 21 to rent my home.  If you are not 21 and would like to rent my home, you must have permission to do so.  When you book, I will ask for a picture of your license which must match the profile picture and name of the guest booking the home.

Please please please DO NOT SMOKE IN MY HOME.  You may smoke outside on either the front or back porch.  Again....please please please DO NOT SMOKE in my home.
I do have Nest cameras outside.  I am able to see the number of people that enter the home.  Your reservation must reflect the same number of people that are staying in the home.

If your group comes with several vehicles, please do everything you can to park all vehicles in the driveway.  If you are unable to do so, please park in front of the house but not in front of the neighbors house.  PLEASE DO NOT PARK ON MY LAWN.  If this happens, you will be asked to leave without a refund.
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
I have said it before and it's on my "House Rules" but please do not smoke in my home.  No matter how hard you try to hide it, I will smell it.  I do have a security deposit listed but this is only charged if something is found to have been lost, broken or excessive cleaning is necessary to return the space back to its original condition.

Pets are welcome in my home but I MUST know what pets you will be bringing and how many pets will be joining you.  At this time, pets are not allowed upstairs.  They must be kept downstairs in the tiled or hardwood areas.  I do have a gate that can be used to block the stairs so that your pets do not travel upstairs.  There will bee a $25 fee for each pet.
sectionedDescription.interaction: I do my best to meet with guests but will not always be available to do so.  You will have the entire home to yourself but I am very close to be able to assist with any needs.  If you have allergies to pets, please be aware that I do have indoor pets but they will not be in the home during your stay and they do not shed so you will not have to deal with fur.

photos.caption: Welcome to Apollo House - your stunning home away from home in the quaint city of Rogers, Arkansas!
Set between the kitchen and entry area, our this conversational area is a crowd favorite.
Our Master bedroom is complete with a King-size bed, HUGE walk-in closet, dresser, 49" Samsung Smart TV, desk with chair and stunning en suite bath with tiled shower and free-standing tub.
Our second King bedroom is complete with a large closet, 49" Samsung Smart TV, eye-catching “It Was All a Dream" LED lights and nearby bath.
Guests will have full access to our two garages. Feel free to park your cars or store your bikes here!
In our backyard, you'll find our large, fully fenced- in yard, four adirondack chairs and fire pit.
Our Queen bedroom has a large closet, gorgeous frame wall, plenty of natural light and a nearby bath.
Our last bedroom has 2 Queen-size beds, a dresser, desk with office chair and nearby bathroom.
From here, we'll begin the walking tour of our home!
Welcome home!
When you first enter our home, the first thing you'll notice is our stunning vaulted ceilings and the modern chandelier hanging above our foyer.
The foyer features our credenza with an iPad for check-in. The conversational room can be found just inside the front doors.
We love this massive mirror, which mocks the shape of our chandelier!
This space is complete with four high-back chairs, long coffee table, gorgeous open shelves and plenty of unique decorations.
The shelves are full of knick knacks and books we've gathered over the years!
Straight ahead, you'll see our main living room!
This space has a black leather sectional, two cozy chairs, 61" Samsung Smart TV and our show-stopping black granite fireplace.
Plenty of cozy seating for the entire crew!
Inside the cabinet under the TV, you'll find board games for your use!
Through the main living space, you'll find our 6-top dining table and kitchen!
Here, you'll see a bar area with three wooden barstools looking into the kitchen.
Our kitchen is outfitted with a beautiful white tile backsplash, white countertops and natural wood accents!
Our bright, open kitchen is fully-equipped for creating your favorite meal, baked good or cup of coffee.
We have anything you could ever need to whip up something delicious.
Crack open one of our cookbooks to try out a new recipe!
We have plenty to choose from!
Our Master bedroom can be found on the ground floor.
It's complete with a King-size bed, HUGE walk-in closet, dresser, 49" Samsung Smart TV and stunning en suite bath with tiled shower and free-standing tub.
Here, you'll also find a private seating area and desk.
The Master bath has a gorgeous double sink area with green cabinetry and round mirrors.
It also has a white tiled shower and free-standing tub.
We recommend at least one bath a day here!
Amenities for your stay!
Upstairs, our King bedroom is complete with a large closet, 49" Samsung Smart TV and nearby bath.
It also has this super fun, eye-catching “It Was All a Dream" LED light!
Down the hall, our Queen bedroom has a large closet, gorgeous frame wall, plenty of natural light and a nearby bath.
We love how bright and airy this space is.
Finally, our last bedroom has 2 Queen-size beds, a dresser and nearby bathroom.
It also has a private desk with an office chair.
This full bathroom can be found upstairs.
This half bathroom can be found downstairs.
Our laundry room is fully outfitted with a washer, a dryer, detergent, dryer sheets and an iron for your use.
Enter the backyard through the sliding door located in our dining room. Here, you'll find our large, fully fenced- in yard, four adirondack chairs and fire pit.
An arial shot of our home, featuring our huge backyard!
You can see the location of our home here!
An arial shot of our quiet neighborhood in Rogers, Arkansas.

primaryHost.about:
Cohobnb Properties is a vacation rental management company serving Northwest Arkansas and beyond. We at Cohobnb pride ourselves in offering our guests the best local experience they can receive with 5-star hospitality and cleanliness making them want to come back time and time again. We are only a moment's notice away for any questions you might have! We look forward to hosting you.
"Short-Term Leasing, Long-Term Freedom"
