sectionedDescription.access: Guests will have access to the entire pictured home including all amenities.
sectionedDescription.description:
Welcome to Apollo House - your stunning home away from home in the heart of Uptown Rogers.

With its modern, open floor plan and four luxury bedrooms, the Apollo House is ready to comfortably host up to 11 guests. Settle into our genuine leather sectional for a movie, crack open a new book in our den, whip up a meal in our beautifully-remodeled kitchen or gather around the fire pit outback for ghost stories and s'mores... whatever you choose, our home is the perfect place for a little R+R.   


Since Apollo House is located just minutes from everything Uptown Rogers has to offer,  we invite you to catch a concert at the AMP, do a little shopping at the Pinnacle Hills Promenade, challenge your friends to a healthy competition of Topgolf, or hop on the extensive Razorback Greenway for a walk, run or bike ride.

  
The space:  


When you first enter our home, the first thing you'll notice is our stunning vaulted ceilings and the modern chandelier hanging above our foyer. Directly to the left, you'll see our conversational room with four high-back chairs, a long coffee table, and gorgeous open shelves. Straight ahead, you'll see our main living room with black leather sectional, two cozy chairs, 70" Samsung Smart TV and our show-stopping black granite fireplace. Inside the cabinet under the TV, you'll find board games for your use during your stay!

Through the main living space, you'll enter our airy dining room and kitchen. Along the bank of windows to the right, sits our six-top dining table. To the left, you'll see a bar area with three wooden barstools. Our kitchen, which is outfitted with a beautiful white tile backsplash, white countertops, all new appliances, and natural wood accents, is fully-equipped for creating your favorite meal, cup of coffee, or even baked good.

When it's time for bed, choose from one of our four luxury bedrooms. (1) Our Master bedroom is complete with a King-size bed, HUGE walk-in closet, dresser, 55" Samsung Smart TV, desk with chair and stunning en suite bath with tiled shower and free-standing tub. (2) Upstairs, our second King bedroom is complete with a large closet, 55" Samsung Smart TV, eye-catching “It Was All a Dream" LED lights and nearby bath. (3) Our Queen bedroom has a large closet, gorgeous frame wall, plenty of natural light and a nearby bath. (4) Finally, our last bedroom has 2 queen-size beds, a dresser, desk with computer monitor and office chair and nearby bathroom. We also have an air mattress with linens to sleep an extra guest when needed.  


Enter the backyard through the sliding door located in our dining room, and you'll find our large, fully fenced-in yard, four Adirondack chairs and fire pit. This is the perfect space to swap stories around the fire, play a game of catch in the yard, or enjoy an evening beverage!

  
Other things to note:

★ 3 miles from all of Uptown Rogers' hotspots - the Walmart Arkansas Music Pavilion, Pinnacle Hills Promenade, Village on the Creeks, Topgolf, local boutiques and countless restaurants.

★ 3 miles from access to NWA's premier walking, riding and biking trail - the extensive Razorback Greenway!

★ 2 miles from Pinnacle Country Club and Shadow Valley Country Club - both offer world-class golf courses and amenities.

★ 15 minutes from XNA!

★ 3 miles from highway access - easily get to Bentonville, Bella Vista, or Fayetteville!  


★ Quiet, family-friendly neighborhood.  


★ Sleeps 11.  


★ 4 luxury bedrooms! (1) King bed (2) King bed (3) Queen bed (4) 2 Queen beds

★ Air mattress and sheets provided for more sleeping space.  


★ 2 STUNNING living spaces with top of line luxury seating.  


★ Office area with computer monitor and webcam for zoom calls.  


★ Fully-stocked kitchen with high-end amenities, cookware and supplies.  


★ Fully fenced-in backyard with seating and fire pit!  


★ Board games available!  


★ 3 car garage for guest use.  


★ Washer and dryer for guest use.  
★ Extra towels and linens during your stay.  
★ Pets allowed with a fee.  


Guest Access & Amenities:  
Guests will have access to the entire pictured house, all appliances, any kitchen supplies, and all amenities. We provide amenities in the bathrooms, kitchen, and laundry room with enough to get you started on your trip. We do not provide excess for more than a couple of days' worth and guests are responsible for purchasing these items for personal use if they run out during their stay.

Guests will have access to the entire pictured home including all amenities.

We will be available at any point via phone or text to assist with your stay!
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
- Check-in is anytime after 3:00 PM.
- No parties or events. If a party that has not been pre-arranged with us occurs or is discovered, you will be fined $1000.
- Pets are welcome with a small fee.
- This is a no smoking home, if you smoke in the home you will be fined $1000 plus the cost of any smoke remediation necessary. You may smoke outside.
- Please note that we charge up to $100 per hour for late checkouts if not previously arranged.
- No parking in the street and or on the lawn
- Quiet hours after 10pm, no smoking on the property
- Pet relief area in backyard - please always clean up after pets

listing.name: The "Little Red Cottage" in Cave Springs

reviews.comments: This is my third time staying here and will continually come back. Lisa and her family make you feel so special and like you’re coming home. She is such a great host and you won’t be disappointed staying here. Centrally located but also quiet and peaceful. This is a must while in NWA.

listing.name: The "Little Red Cottage" in Cave Springs

reviews.comments: Fantastic stay in this adorable cabin!!!  Cozy, comfy cabin with all the touches of home.  Our host, Lisa, was super helpful and responsive with the details—even made a special trip out to salt the driveway and front walk before our arrival with the snow and ice still on the ground.  Kitchen had everything we needed including muffins, coffee and bottled water,  and the family room was the perfect place to hang out in front of the electric fireplace.  Enjoyed exploring the beautiful property and surrounding area We also loved the central location to Fayetteville and Bentonville. HIGHLY recommend the Little Red Cabin!

primaryHost.about:
Hello, I am a native of Southern California, but spent every Summer growing up in Northwest Arkansas and Southwest Missouri on my Grandparent's farm.   I have always felt this area was home with my family and so many wonderful memories here.   I graduated from the University of New Orleans, married my husband Steve, (38 years now).  We then we moved to Tucson, Arizona.  I pursued a career in residential real estate, new home construction and property management that lasted 14 years.  We loved Tucson, but wanted to raise our children in the green belt.  We could think of no better place than Beautiful Northwest Arkansas, so we relocated here 23 years ago.  We just love the lakes,  trees and four seasons.  
I love renovating property, decorating, cooking, traveling and entertaining friends and family.
primaryHost.name: Lisa

sectionedDescription.description:
Welcome to the “Little Red Cottage” in Cave Springs.  This  Historic Farmhouse was completely renovated with the exception of the original wood floors.  The decorating is full of color, detail and elegance, and yet the floor-plan is very functional and comfortable.  This 1200 square foot cottage sits on 20 acres in the middle of Northwest Arkansas, close to everything.  Just 6 miles to XNA, 8 miles to the Walmart Home office, miles to Crystal Bridges , and 17 miles to the University of Arkansas.

This cottage is immaculately clean for the most particular travelers.  The house is limited to 4 people and has a no pet policy and is a no smoking home.  However, smoking is permitted outside on the patios.

There are three patio/porch areas to enjoy the great outdoors and don’t be surprised by the resident deer in the yard.  The is  plenty of room to park horse trailers, bike trailers, and RV’S.   Just let us know what your needs are and hopefully we can accommodate them.
sectionedDescription.houseRules: The home is limited to no more than 4 people . The home is a NON-Smoking home, which includes both "vaping" and "smoking".  However,  Smoking/vaping is allowed outside on the patios.  It is also a no pet or pet free home.

primaryHost.about:
I'm a mom of five, 13-21, used to be a self-employed speech therapist, a self-made (aka lack of formal schooling) renovator/decorator. From Boston originally, but have lived in Northwest Arkansas the past 14.5 years.

Love all things home, the older the better- junking, re-modeling, mixing old with new, anything to make a home functional & up to date, yet warm and inviting.
primaryHost.name: Helene

sectionedDescription.access:
I don't live on  premise but am available 24/7 via text or email. I do live close if anything is needed during or before your stay. Guests will receive a lockbox code with a key inside. We have two other airbnbs just off the Bentonville Square and it's been a fantastic overall experience. I get to visit with so many interesting people from all over!

Text Helene for more info. 479-883-8598.
sectionedDescription.description:
Lovely, updated house in town, great alternative location to Embassy Suites...2 bed 1 bath on acre in Rogers, exit 82 (between Fayetteville & Bentonville). 1-3 min. drive to Pinnacle Promenade, Top Golf, Bass Pro Shops, eateries &AMP (concert venue)...Single garage, w/d room, open plan, wifi/cable, queen, modern kitchen. Bath next to bedroom. Covered back porch, country views. Three exits to Crystal Bridges. Sidewalks connect to bike trails. Text Helene for more info., 479-883-8598.

The Perry Road House is a piece of country right in town on an acre with a big covered back porch and lovely view of nature for relaxing. There's a single garage with a key pad, garage clicker for parking and or bikes. There's also a long gravel driveway. There's a lockbox with the key to the front door. The house itself is lovely, all newly renovated. 

We also own the one next door with 2 beds and 2 baths also on the sites for short term stays.

Driftwood floors all over, no carpet. Mid century modern accents. Gray walls, white trim, newly redone kitchen with stainless appliances, black walnut butcher block countertops, dark hardware..one  bedrooms one with a queen and the another with a full and twin. The bathroom is between the two bedrooms with one single sink vanity and a nice shower.  There's also a laundry room with a standard sized washer/dryer. There's a door to the back porch off of the laundry room. The house has the amenities of home with dishes, keurig/pods, ice maker in freezer, gas cook top, cleaning supplies, towels, all the things to make your stay comfortable...cable, wifi, big tv in the open living area.

The house is right off the interstate, exit 82. Crystal Bridges & The Momentary are 15 min north & the university is approximately 25 min south in Fayetteville . The house has sidewalks that connect to the Greenway, wide scenic bike trails that go from Fayetteville to Bella Vista. Rogers & Bentonville are also loaded with mountain biking trails & pump parks. There are restaurants, brewpubs, yoga studios and shopping a bike ride away as well. The outdoor concert venue, aka “The AMP” is a 2 min drive. Sidewalks line the street. sectionedDescription.space:
The Perry Road House is a piece of country right in town on an acre with a big covered back porch and lovely view of nature for relaxing. There's a single garage with a key pad, garage clicker for parking and or bikes. There's also a long gravel driveway. There's a lockbox with the key to the front door. The house itself is lovely, all newly renovated. 

We also own the one next door with 2 beds and 2 baths also on the sites for short term stays.

Driftwood floors all over, no carpet. Mid century modern accents. Gray walls, white trim, newly redone kitchen with stainless appliances, black walnut butcher block countertops, dark hardware..one  bedrooms one with a queen and the another with a full and twin. The bathroom is between the two bedrooms with one single sink vanity and a nice shower.  There's also a laundry room with a standard sized washer/dryer. There's a door to the back porch off of the laundry room. The house has the amenities of home with dishes, keurig/pods, ice maker in freezer, gas cook top, cleaning supplies, towels, all the things to make your stay comfortable...cable, wifi, big tv in the open living area.

The house is right off the interstate, exit 82. Crystal Bridges & The Momentary are 15 min north & the university is approximately 25 min south in Fayetteville . The house has sidewalks that connect to the Greenway, wide scenic bike trails that go from Fayetteville to Bella Vista. Rogers & Bentonville are also loaded with mountain biking trails & pump parks. There are restaurants, brewpubs, yoga studios and shopping a bike ride away as well. The outdoor concert venue, aka “The AMP” is a 2 min drive. Sidewalks line the street. Really fantastic location for bikers, concert goers, university parents/visitors, business travelers, a weekend getaway, museum goers and more.

We provide a large man’s sized bike and hybrid women’s bike. Like new. 

Kids are considered guests.
Not toddler/infant friendly.

NOT pet friendly. NO dogs allowed.

We own 2 bed 2 bath house next door for rent as well. Message for details.
sectionedDescription.summary: Lovely, updated house in town, great alternative location to Embassy Suites...2 bed 1 bath on acre in Rogers, exit 82 (between Fayetteville & Bentonville). 1-3 min. drive to Pinnacle Promenade, Top Golf, Bass Pro Shops, eateries &AMP (concert venue)...Single garage, w/d room, open plan, wifi/cable, queen, modern kitchen. Bath next to bedroom. Covered back porch, country views. Three exits to Crystal Bridges. Sidewalks connect to bike trails. Text Helene for more info., 479-883-8598.

name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay and would choose to stay here again. The house is in a great location. It is close to shopping and restaurants and is quiet for peaceful sleep. The house has a very nice fully stocked kitchen that we easily used to make a few meals. The entire house was well stocked and even had several games, puzzles, and books. We highly recommend this house and host.

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments:
Lovely place, very comfortable and enjoyable! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here!

My 8 month old learned how to crawl up the little step from the living room to the kitchen, much to her delight. The coming down part didn't go so well, but that didn't stop her any. Now back at home she's trying to climb EvErYtHiNg and nothing we have is as easy to conquer as that nice little step! 😀

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.response: Thanks so much for choosing our special place--and I especially love the anecdote about your daughter's newly-acquired skill :)    What a fun memory!

reviews.comments: Agree with other reviews.  Carolyn is a great host and this is a great location.  Our stay involved activities in Bentonville and Fayetteville so the location was perfect.  Easy on, easy off the interstate.  I had a few questions considering our stay was over Thanksgiving, but Carolyn answered them quickly and completely.  Believe the hype, The Vintage Retreat is comfortable, well supplied and the beds are awesome!

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.response: Thanks so much for the great review, Dietrich; we really appreciate your taking the time to write such kind words. We also appreciate your personal feedback on a possible "critter access" point outside  :O  We are getting right on that!!!

reviews.comments: This house has everything you could need and more for a short or long term stay. There are pamphlets, good instructions, all the kitchen equipment, and plenty of space for the whole family. The backyard has a nice firepit and the wifi is 100+mbps perfect for working. Everything you could want to see or do is ~15 minute drive and coffee and restaurants are a 10 minute or less drive. I highly suggest Iron Horse Coffee Company. Easily the best coffee shop in town and I tried them all. I would definitely stay here again.

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.response: Thanks for the great review, Andrew. You were a top-notch guest. Iron Horse is actually my favorite coffee spot; it is THE original place to go for coffee in Rogers. (And the Big Man with extra horseradish sauce is MWAH!!!) We also appreciate your personal feedback and you are exactly right! #gettinerdid

reviews.comments: Awesome space and close to all fun activities! Love the area!

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments: My family stayed here for my wedding weekend and it provided them a great place to be near the venue and where I live.

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments: This is a great place to stay, cozy and warm. The house decor was nostalgic, we loved it. And our hostess was incredible.

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments: It was great!

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments: Carolyn and Matt were very attentive to our needs. The place was very clean and well supplied with towels, utensils and dinner ware. The house was perfectly located for us close to the meeting hall where we were meeting. Very close to stores and restaurants.

listing.name: Vintage Retreat Near The AMP and Pinnacle Mall

reviews.comments:
My family & I enjoyed an extended stay at Carolyn’s super cute Vintage Retreat. We really liked all the house had to offer! We were working remotely during our stay. I wish I didn’t have to work so much & could have seen more of the wonderful NWA area. We did go to a Razorback game - Woo Pigs!!!  Also I did manage to eat at Neighbors Mill on my way out of town & now wish we had gone there for desserts every night! 😂 
Carolyn was extremely accommodating & very easy to communicate with. I highly recommend a stay at Carolyn & Matt’s place👍 👍

photos.caption: Welcome to our vintage retreat! It features 3 large bedrooms, 1.5 baths, and ample parking--within just a few miles of all our city's fun!
Relax in our airy, vintage-styled living room.
Dine where the action is, and open the sliding glass doors for more outdoor seating options.
New appliances, coffee bar, pots and pans, and some basic food prep items will make your stay a homey one.
This bedroom opens to a half-bath, which then leads into the main bath. It features a new queen bed and all-new, comfy bedding.
Open living and dining room with 55-inch television and queen-sized memory foam pull-out couch bed. Dining table for six.
More seating options in the kitchen!
Seating for up to 13 (or more!) in this spacious area.

This retreat-like bedroom is perfect for yoga--it features an extra-large set of mirrored closet doors and ample floor space.  We even have a mat ready for you! There's also a fun puzzle table and several puzzle selections. New queen bed and bedding.
This bedroom features a writing desk and a new queen bed and bedding.
This newly-renovated full bath features a tile shower and ample counter space. It is connected by a pocket door to the small half-bath (private toilet and sink).
Sliding doors off of the combination living/dining room open to a small patio with seating for four.  An in-ground fire pit and tree stump seating for 8 provides a fun place to relax.

primaryHost.about: Raised in Rogers, we LOVE our city! We're new retirees--Carolyn from 28 years teaching in Rogers, and Matt, 27 years as a Rogers firefighter.  Married 25 years, we 're parents to three awesome young adults.
primaryHost.name: Carolyn

sectionedDescription.access: You'll have the whole house and yard. *The yard is not fenced in.
sectionedDescription.description:
Vintage Retreat is the perfect place to get away and enjoy time for all Rogers has to offer (well, what you can squeeze in, anyway--there's just SO much!). Our space is unique with its vintage flair and new, cozy comforts. We're close to all of the newly-developed areas in Rogers, and our charming downtown isn't far.  Matt and I are only a text or call away, and we are happy to answer any questions and share our favorite things about our hometown.

Our home offers an eclectic mix of fun decor paired with new beds and seating, and new, cozy linens.  We've renovated the shower bath and the half bath and updated the kitchen. Parking for multiple cars and optional indoor storage for motorcycles; as Airbnb visitors ourselves, we knew what features we wanted to be completely new!

You'll have the whole house and yard. *The yard is not fenced in.

We live just a couple of miles from the house, and all of our extended family lives here, as well--so if you need something, text or call us, and we'll get you taken care of!

Vintage Retreat is located about a minute's drive from Target, Bass Pro Shop, and the Pinnacle Promenade Mall. The mall has all of your favorite stores, as well as a Dave and Buster's and a Malco theater.  We are just under 2.5 miles from the AMP, Top Golf, and their surrounding restaurants.  As far as safety goes, we are just under a mile from the ROGERS POLICE DEPARTMENT.  For those of you who'd like to bike or walk our city's amazing trails, we're convenient to the NWA Razorback Regional Greenway. We are near Marker 24 on the greenway trail, and we have great city sidewalks and concrete trails that connect along the way. If you desire a fancier coffee than what we have ;) there's a Starbucks inside the Target, and Bolder Coffee, a local coffee shop, can be found just down the road. If you'd like a unique cocktail showcasing locally-brewed spirits, be sure to try Fox Trail Distillery off of Bellview, open Wednesday-Sunday.  Fox Trail offers whiskey and spirit tours, and we'd love you to check them out! There's usually a food truck there, as well. If you're looking for  some good pizza and beer, we recommend local favorite, Bariola's, located just a few miles away.

Because of our proximity to the interstate, restaurants, the Arkansas Music Pavilion, and Mercy Hospital, we have quite a few Uber drivers serving the area.

We're newbies at this, and we may have overlooked something (or have not gotten to something yet), so please let us know what we have forgotten or should consider adding!
Thanks for your support in our adventure.

name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.comments: Great lake view

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.comments: We had a great time in Richard &Jina lake home, everything was perfect very clean and good location 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.comments: This place is perfect for a small family or several couples wanting to get away for the weekend.  The place was very clean and had everything we needed.  It is right on the lake and very pretty.  We will definitely stay again if we are in the area.

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.comments: This was our second year staying at Jina and Richard’s lake house and it was even better than last year! The waterfront access to swimming, kayaking, fishing was fantastic once again, and nothing can beat that view from the deck with your morning coffee. Inside was beautiful and clean the the newly renovated bathroom is lovely.

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.response: Love having you as guests.  Looking forward to your next visit already!

reviews.comments: Super place to stay! This was our return trip and it was better than the first! They had a recent bathroom remodel that looks wonderful! You have everything in one place! Kitchen is well stocked, with snacks and water. There is an abundance of towels. We just come in and throw our bathing suits in the dryer so we can go back out after lunch or dinner. They have board games in the closet. We can’t say enough good things about this lake spot. Convenient parking, boat ramp is super close, town is still close if you forget something. We even forgot our extension cord, Richard and Jina brought us one! There is a fantastic family style chicken right down the road but be sure to go hungry! We love sitting on the back patio and drinking coffee in the mornings. It’s so relaxing. The cove is super calm! We are already planning next years trip to the same place!

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.response: You guys are the best!  We love having you come back year to year and we also are already looking forward to your next visit. Be safe and well until we see you again!

reviews.comments: So much fun to be had here and such a great location! We spent one day exploring surrounding areas and the next just having a blast at the house! So close to lake! Peaceful mornings and fun packed day playing on the water and fishing! Thank you Richard and Jina for such a perfect family weekend!

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.response: Great to have you all as guests,  Maddy! Glad you had so much fun.   Hope you can visit again in the future!

reviews.comments:
You'd be hard-pressed to find anywhere to stay that puts you closer to the water!   The cove that the house is on is very quiet.  Sitting outside or fishing from the shore, you seldom hear a human voice!  You get to listen to nature instead!   And, of course, there's the view!

We enjoyed the spacious kitchen and master bedroom.  And the cleanliness of the place was very impressive, including the insides of appliances.   Little touches like the snacks...and the fact that the medicine cabinet had some aloe lotion in it (I got my face nice and sun-burned) were greatly appreciated!

The bed and pillows were very comfortable and I liked the towels too.

I also appreciated that, even though we didn't use them, there was a gas grill, a row boat, extra chairs, and other extra outdoor items that were available for us to use.  They really thought of a lot of extra things you might want to help you enjoy the yard and the water.

We used the house as a sort of "base camp" for visiting family in Rogers and for fishing. I hired a guide service that met me at nearby Horseshoe Bend Marina.  (Shout-out to Russell Taylor with "Get the Net" Guide Service.. who helped me catch several meals-worth of spotted bass !!)   

It's about a 10 minute drive to stores and restaurants in Rogers, 20 minutes to the more trendy stuff in Bentonville.  But there's a restaurant nearby that serves fried chicken, family style.  Good stuff!

Overall, we had a great time and this is a great place to make some memories!

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.response: Wow!  Great, detailed review David! We appreciate that and thank you for being great guests!  Please come visit again soon!

reviews.comments:
Their description is spot on. Clean and spacious. Felt like home away from home.  The patio was the perfect place to relax, enjoy a cup of coffee while watching the families of geese navigate the waters. Hosts reply quickly and give tips when needed! 
Thank you!

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.response: Thanks for being great guests, Robin!  Hope you'll come visit again soon!

reviews.comments: Great place to stay in the NWA area! Right on the water, large, beautifully updated apartment with all the amenities to make your stay relaxing and stress free. Close enough to everything, but far enough away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Would definitely stay here again!

listing.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!

reviews.response: Thanks Mike!  Loved having you as guests and hope to host you again soon!

reviews.comments: We thoroughly enjoyed our time. The location for this price value far exceeded our expectations. Clean space, wonderful extra touches included, and great communication.

sectionedDescription.access: You have free-run of the entire bottom apartment with your own entrance and private deck.  We give you an access code of your choice for your private entry.
sectionedDescription.description:
Our home on Beaver Lake is close to restaurants, parks, art and culture (Walton Arts Center, Crystal Bridges, etc.),   and you can't get any closer to Beaver Lake!  Our place is great for couples and families (with kids).  You get the entire bottom apartment to yourselves! (Separate entrance)
We can even offer you access to our row boat and Kayaks (Beaver lake is 44 square miles of pristine water with almost 500 miles of scenic shoreline)

You get the entire bottom apartment which has it's own entrance and walks out to a level grass area only a few steps from the lake.
Be assured that we sanitize and disinfect before and after every stay!
This bottom level has 3 bedrooms, 1 Bath (tub, sink toilet and towels supplied) a kitchenette which is stocked with dishes, flatware, cooking pots/pans/utensils and Kurig coffee maker.  You also have access to your own deck with a gas grille you can use.
We have a big grassy area between the house and the lake with a fire pit and swing.
We have some water floats which you can use in the lake as well as an aluminum rowboat with oars and 2 Kayaks which we can allow use of.

You have free-run of the entire bottom apartment with your own entrance and private deck.  We give you an access code of your choice for your private entry.

Jina and Richard live on the top apartment and will be available to host your stay.

Our home is not far from the historic "Pyramids" submerged amphitheater in Beaver Lake.  
The old resort town was submerged under the lake in 1966 when the dam was constructed. You can explore any above water structures that were not flooded back in 1966 which include the hotel tower, a historic site.
Read more about the history here: (URL HIDDEN)

We provide parking for your vehicles.  Since we are outside of the city limits, you are able to book a cab or Uber if you don't want to drive into town.
If you have a boat, there is a ramp about a mile down the road which you can put in, and then either pull onto shore behind our house or easily moor a few feet off shore.

We're located on a quiet cove with bluffs and very little boat disruption.....but you are minutes from Horseshoe Bend Marina and open lake areas.
sectionedDescription.interaction: Jina and Richard live on the top apartment and will be available to host your stay.
sectionedDescription.name: Lakehouse has Spectacular View plus Easy Access!
sectionedDescription.neighborhoodOverview:
Our home is not far from the historic "Pyramids" submerged amphitheater in Beaver Lake.  
The old resort town was submerged under the lake in 1966 when the dam was constructed. You can explore any above water structures that were not flooded back in 1966 which include the hotel tower, a historic site.
Read more about the history here: (URL HIDDEN)
sectionedDescription.notes: We're located on a quiet cove with bluffs and very little boat disruption.....but you are minutes from Horseshoe Bend Marina and open lake areas.
sectionedDescription.space:
You get the entire bottom apartment which has it's own entrance and walks out to a level grass area only a few steps from the lake.
Be assured that we sanitize and disinfect before and after every stay!
This bottom level has 3 bedrooms, 1 Bath (tub, sink toilet and towels supplied) a kitchenette which is stocked with dishes, flatware, cooking pots/pans/utensils and Kurig coffee maker.  You also have access to your own deck with a gas grille you can use.
We have a big grassy area between the house and the lake with a fire pit and swing.
We have some water floats which you can use in the lake as well as an aluminum rowboat with oars and 2 Kayaks which we can allow use of.
sectionedDescription.summary:
Our home on Beaver Lake is close to restaurants, parks, art and culture (Walton Arts Center, Crystal Bridges, etc.),   and you can't get any closer to Beaver Lake!  Our place is great for couples and families (with kids).  You get the entire bottom apartment to yourselves! (Separate entrance)
We can even offer you access to our row boat and Kayaks (Beaver lake is 44 square miles of pristine water with almost 500 miles of scenic shoreline)
sectionedDescription.transit:
We provide parking for your vehicles.  Since we are outside of the city limits, you are able to book a cab or Uber if you don't want to drive into town.
If you have a boat, there is a ramp about a mile down the road which you can put in, and then either pull onto shore behind our house or easily moor a few feet off shore.

primaryHost.about:
Hi! We’re Evolve, the hospitality team that helps you rest easy when you rent a private, professionally cleaned home from us.

We promise your rental will be clean, safe, and true to what you saw on Airbnb or we'll make it right. Check-ins are always smooth, and we're here 24/7 to answer any questions or help you find the perfect property.
primaryHost.name: Evolve

sectionedDescription.description:
This lakeside retreat will be the highlight of your next vacation! Nestled just off the shore of Beaver Lake, this home boasts ample living space complete with 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms with spa showers, and a fully equipped kitchen. Unwind on the deck or fire up the gas grill as the kids play on the playset in the yard. Spend your days boating and kayaking across the lake or checking out any of the nearby parks. No matter your chosen adventure, this vacation rental is sure to fit the bill!

Free WiFi | Lake View | 2,000 Sq Ft

This modern lakehouse is the perfect destination for groups or families looking to rest, relax, and escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life!

Bedroom 1: King Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3: Queen Bed | Bedroom 4: 2 Twin Beds

KITCHEN: Fully equipped, Keurig coffee maker, blender, Crock-Pot, stainless steel appliances, dishware & flatware, spices
OUTDOOR LIVING: Deck w/ seating, gas grill, fire pit, yard space, children's playset, tree swing
INDOOR LIVING: Smart TVs, wood-burning fireplace, dining table, ceiling fans, spa showers, hardwood floors
GENERAL: Washer & dryer, towels, linens, complimentary toiletries, central air conditioning/heat, keyless entry
FAQ: Steps required to access home
PARKING: Driveway (2 vehicles), concrete pad (2 vehicles), concrete pad (1 trailer/boat)

Evolve makes it easy to find and book properties you’ll never want to leave. You can relax knowing that our properties will always be ready for you and that we’ll answer the phone 24/7. Even better, if anything is off about your stay, we’ll make it right. You can count on our homes and our people to make you feel welcome--because we know what vacation means to you.

BEAVER LAKE: Hwy 94 Boat Ramp & Swim Area (1.5 miles), Horseshoe Bend Marina (5.6 miles), Prairie Creek Marina (7.3 miles) 
EATS: Monte Ne Chicken Restaurant (1.1 miles), The Rail - A Pizza Company (5.4 miles), Las Palmas (5.4 miles), Parkside Public (5.5 miles), Havana Tropical Grill (5.7 miles), Smokin' Joe's Ribhouse (6.1 miles), Big Orange (8.2 miles)
ATTRACTIONS: Historic Monte Ne District (on-site),  Rail Yard Bike Park (3.8 miles), Arkansas Music Pavilion (6.3 miles), The Walmart Museum (13.9 miles), Slaughter Pen Trail (14.1 miles), Scott Family Amazeum (14.7 miles), Museum of Native American History (14.7 miles), Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art (15.0 miles)
PARKS: Lake Atalanta Park (6.0 miles), Hobbs State Park Conservation Area (14.5 miles), Pea Ridge National Military Park (15.5 miles), War Eagle Cavern (16.9 miles)
AIRPORT: Northwest Arkansas National Airport (16.7 miles)

name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: What a great place! Warm, well decorated, great shower, comfortable bed…I hope to stay again soon! The washer/dryer was a GREAT HELP to me…thank you for being an incredible host!

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: From day one this was a complete nightmare. Phyllis was basically our personal stalker. She would open her door and sit down(not say a word) and WATCH US. She didn’t allow us to park our motorcycles next the Airbnb so we had to park them on the side of the property. Where we had no visibility of them. Mind you we spoke to her ahead of time and she was completely fine with them. There is a gate we have to open to get stuff into the Airbnb. She would would wait to release her dogs on us when we would have to enter the gate. Then she would proceed to scream at us to not let her dogs out of the gate. We love dogs but we weren’t even notified she would have dogs. I would just say save yourself the headache and GET ANOTHER AIRBNB. We took pictures of the condition of the place just in case she tries to commit fraud. This is our first bad experience everywhere else we have stayed has been amazing. Thank god this stay is over and we don’t have to deal with Phyllis our crazy stalker.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.response:
1. From day one this was a complete nightmare. Phyllis was basically our personal stalker. She would open her door and sit down(not say a word) and WATCH US.
answer:  We sit on our deck daily for relaxation, everyday.

2. She didn’t allow us to park our motorcycles next the Airbnb so we had to park them on the side of the property.
Answer: They were asked to park just outside the gate in front of their truck, since they left the gate open 10-15 minutes at a time.

3.Mind you we  spoke to her ahead of time and she was completely fine with them.
Answer: There was no conversation about anything but price

4. She would wait to release her dogs on us when we would have to enter the gate. 
Answer: The dogs move freely in the back yard but 90% of the time are in the house. The presence of the dogs is on our site. They are tiny toy poodles. As Of this  year we have 10- 12 other quests and have never recieved a complaint about our dogs or had any trouble with people leaving the gate open.

5. This is our first bad experience.
 everywhere else we have stayed has been amazing. 
Answer: This is not true. These people had 2 bad  reviews about not following the rules,  so bad that I canceled them once but decided to take a chance on the other good reviews they had, clearly a mistake! Phyllis LNC. The White House

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay!

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.response: We are glad you came!

reviews.comments: Plenty of things to do in Rogers and Eureka springs is close. You will love your host. She will give you some ideas of what's a great spot to go but also understands privacy.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: Great little place with everything you need.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: This AirBnB is exactly what we needed when we were looking for a place to stay in (Website hidden by Airbnb) the summer. The pool and the sounds of birds chirping relaxed us into oblivion, and the location is also great-all the towns in NWA are within a 30 minute drive.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: Very clean. Left us snacks and bottled water. Also provided coffee.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: My 7 year old son and I stayed for 3 nights and it was the perfect location for a relaxed visit. It felt like we went to visit my parents home; everything is comfortable. Phyllis provided thoughtful touches of snacks and food. She is quick to respond with questions and made helpful  suggestions for outings. We loved the pool and the beautiful back yard. We visited the children’s Amazeum, Wild Eagle Cavern and Crystal Bridges.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Phyllis. Her guesthouse is charming, private and so very comfortable. It has everything you could need plus little treats she surprises you with! She and her husband give you your privacy but are quick to respond and to check on you. I’ll definitely stay again when my budget allows.

listing.name: The White House  Large roomy airy lovely quiet

reviews.comments: It was a quiet , cute and clean place! Convenient to several places especially for what we stayed for. I will definitely return if I’m back in the area ! Phyllis is pleasant and quick to return any questions as well.

sectionedDescription.description:
Quiet secure and private. 1000 s/f of living space. Private pool, Beautiful yard with several gardens lots of trees. Private entrance and deck. Bright and cheerful with lots of windows. Wood floors full kitchen including cooking utensils. Clean, fresh paint. Central heat and air, ceiling fans. Snacks water and coffee provided. TV, satellite DVD and WIFI. Tub with shower

Very close to AMP, Historic Downtown ROGERS and Bentonville. Also Crystal Bridges,
War Eagle. Private gate and driveway for parking car and storage bldg. for motorcycles . Also just North of Fayetteville for Bikes Blues and Barbecue. WalMart home office. Amazeum, non profit one of a kind family owned, interactive hands on activities for children. Daisy Air rifle Museum. High Rise (endless trampolines). Hobbs State Park and museum. Many restaurants and Pinnacle Mall (great shopping ) Very close to walking and biking trails that go for miles, all over Rogers, Bentonville and Fayetteville.

reviews.comments: This is a residential home which suited our needs perfectly. We did tour the area and it was never far from anywhere! Host was very helpful with our questions and the house was easy to look live in.

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.comments: We enjoyed our stay, the house was perfect for our family of 5. Great location and the house was stocked with all the necessities.

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.comments: Our family was in town for a wedding and Marcia's Pleasant Woods home was exceptionally clean, offered many amenities and is conveniently located to all NWA locations.  Will definitely recommend to out of town visitors in the future.

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.comments: This is the second time we have stayed at Marcia’s place.  It is a beautiful modern space that is cozy & inviting and beautifully appointed with spacious rooms. This home is always clean as a whistle!!!  The location is convenient & easy to access. We will be staying again on our next visit to NWA!!

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.comments: Amazing stay!! Would recommend to anyone looking for a place in the area.

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.comments: Marcia is very responsive and easy to work with.   Our team members were working in the area in an extensive project and were so happy to have a "home away from home" after their long work days.  I highly recommend Marcia and her beautiful home!

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.comments: My family stayed at Pleasant Wood for 8 days while visiting family.  We loved the comfortable beds, spacious layout and location of the house.  It’s on a nice quiet road but close to the Walmart AMP, Top Golf, restaurants and shopping.  I originally picked out this house because it had a king bed in the master but it also has a very nice and spacious master shower.  The hostess was super kind and even messaged me halfway through our trip just to make sure we were doing great.   I will for sure book this house again and would confidently recommend it to anyone visiting the area.

listing.name: Pleasant Wood - Family friendly close to Pinnacle

reviews.response: Crystal, Thank you for staying with us and giving us a great review! Please book with us again when you come back to town.

reviews.comments: The house is gorgeous! Everything we needed and more.  My original reservation was during covid but thankfully they let us push the reservation back a year. The communication was great. Would definitely stay again!!

reviews.comments: Our family really enjoyed our stay here! The house was very nice with everything we needed. It is in a really nice, quiet neighborhood with convenient access to the places we were going. We will definitely stay here again if we are in the area.

photos.caption: Welcome to the Hearth House - where comfort and refined art meet!
This cozy room is a wine lovers dream! Enjoy a glass of your favorite wine, or mix up a craft cocktail while you relax with your crew.
Our home is freshly renovated with top of the line furniture and appliances & thoughtful decor throughout.
Kick back and relax by our outdoor fire pit during your stay!
Our kitchen was designed with your crew in mind! Enjoy a quick cup of coffee at the bar or gather around the dining table to enjoy your favorite meals.
Located just 6 minutes from our home, your entire crew can play a few rounds at TopGolf!
This modern bedroom wouldn't be complete without a touch of art!
This 60" Samsung Smart TV is perfect for late night movie marathons!
All of our bedrooms feature luxury linens, bedding, and pillows
From here forward, we will begin our walking tour of the Hearth House.
Guests are greeted tall ceilings and an open living room, decorated top to bottom in modern decor.
To the left is a hallway that leads to the half bath, laundry room, storage closet, and the garage.
The half bathroom downstairs is fully stocked with amenities you'll need during your visit.
To the right is our gorgeous wine-themed sitting room!
Guests can whip up their favorite craft drinks with our mini bar station.
Off of the sitting room is our newly renovated kitchen - featuring top of the line appliances, cooking utensils, a Keurig coffee maker, and all other essentials you'll need during your stay!
Guests can enjoy our gas fireplace and 60" Samsung Smart TV, preloaded with all of your favorite streaming services.
The private master bedroom is truly unlike anything else!
This King-size, luxury bed, is complete with top of the line linens, bedding, and pillows.
Guests can also enjoy a workspace in the master bedroom, perfect for groups that are traveling for work.
The ensuite master bathroom features a large soaking tub and a walk-in shower with a rainfall shower head. The large vanity provides plenty of space for getting ready to explore NWA.
Upstairs you'll find our first bedroom. This room is the ideal place to unwind after a long, adventurous day.
The second bedroom upstairs is bold and perfect for your crew's Netflix guru!
The third upstairs bedroom is a spacious, modern room, with luxury linens, bedding, and pillows.
This room also has a large monitor and desk, perfect for catching up on a few work projects.
The upstairs bathroom features a large vanity and amenities for your stay.
Our home has a large, fenced-in backyard.

primaryHost.about:
Cohobnb Properties is a vacation rental management company serving Northwest Arkansas and beyond. We at Cohobnb pride ourselves in offering our guests the best local experience they can receive with 5-star hospitality and cleanliness making them want to come back time and time again. We are only a moment's notice away for any questions you might have! We look forward to hosting you.
"Short-Term Leasing, Long-Term Freedom"
primaryHost.name: Cohobnb

sectionedDescription.access: Guests will have access to the entire pictured home, including the garage. The garage can be accessed via a keypad on the right side of the garage.
sectionedDescription.description:
The Hearth House is a stylish, luxury home located in Rogers' premiere Hearth Stone subdivision. Located only a 7-minute drive from Pinnacle Hills Promenade and a 5-minute drive from Top Golf & Uptown Rogers, this newly renovated home is perfect for a crew looking to enjoy everything NWA has to offer!   
  
The space:

Styled top to bottom in modern art and unique decor, our 4 bedroom home is unlike anything else! The main level of our home has an open floor plan, featuring a one-of-a-kind wine room with a cozy, intimate seating area and bar station. Off of the wine room, guests will enter our spacious living room - complete with a gas fireplace and a leather sofa for seating up to 7. Guests can also enjoy our brand new, fully renovated kitchen and dining room, complete with top-of-the-line appliances and all of the essentials you'll need during your stay. 

Our private master bedroom is located off of the open living spaces. This jaw-dropping room features a lavish King-size bed, luxury linens, desk space, and a 60" Samsung Smart TV - perfect for all of your streaming needs! The en suite master bathroom is newly renovated with has a modern walk-in shower with a rainfall showerhead, a large soaking tub, his and hers sinks, and a giant walk-in closet. 

Our additional three bedrooms are located upstairs. The first bedroom on the left has a Queen-size bed, fitted with luxury linens and pillows. The middle bedroom features a cozy King-size bed, luxury linens, pillows, and bedding. This room also has a desk with a large monitor for guest use! Finally, our third bedroom has a Queen-size bed and a 60" Samsung Smart TV, preloaded with all of your favorite streaming services.

Guests can also enjoy our fenced-in backyard, complete with a modern outdoor seating area with a fire pit table, grill, and yard games!

  
Guest access:  
Guests will have access to the entire pictured house, all appliances, any kitchen supplies, and all amenities. We provide amenities in the bathrooms, kitchen, and laundry room with enough to get you started on your trip. We do not provide excess for more than a couple of days' worth and guests are responsible for purchasing these items for personal use if they run out during their stay.  
  
Other things to note:  
★ Modern wine-themed sitting room with a minibar station and conversation seating

★ Indoor gas fireplace

★ Outdoor fire pit with seating for 4

★ THREE 60" Samsung Smart TVs preloaded with your favorite streaming services

★ Large soaking tub in the master bedroom

★ The master bathroom has 2 cozy robes  


★ 4 stylish bedrooms including: (1) The master bedroom features an en suite bath, King-size pillow-top mattress, luxury linens, a desk, and a 60" Samsung Smart TV. (2) The first upstairs bedroom is furnished with a Queen-size pillow-top mattress and luxury linens. (3) The second upstairs bedroom features a King-size pillow-top mattress, luxury linens, and a desk with a computer for guest use. (4) The third upstairs bedroom has a Queen-size pillow-top mattress, 60" Samsung Smart TV, and luxury linens.

★ All bedrooms and bathrooms have extra linens, pillows, and towels  
★ Fully fenced-in backyard with a griddle top grill and yard games- Cornhole & Giant Jenga

★ The living room features a large, cozy sectional that seats 7

★ Stylish dining room that seats 5 - plus 3 barstools

★ 7-minute drive to the Pinnacle Hills Promenade, a 6-minute drive to Top Golf, Chuys, and Uptown Rogers!

★ Fully stocked kitchen with top of the line knife set, toaster, Keurig coffee maker, microwave, and more!

★ Luxury bathrobes in the master bathroom

★ Front loading washer and dryer   


★ Pet-friendly with a fee  


  
**Covid-19 cleaning procedures:  
To ensure the safety of our guests and staff, Cohobnb follows the CDC and EPA guidelines to effectively clean and disinfect every property after each check-out. Our cleaners wear gloves and masks while cleaning each property and use bleach-based disinfectants, paying additional attention to frequently touched surfaces. The following lists our cleaning procedures when turning over properties:  
-Cleaners wear disposable gloves and face masks  
-Use of bleach-based disinfectant, paying additional attention to high-touch surfaces  
-High heat wash and dry on linens whenever possible  
-High heat wash and dry of dishes whenever possible  
-Minimal staff member visits to properties  
-Frequent hand washing

**Important** Our properties are protected by SUPERHOG, the digital trust platform that enables Hosts, Operators, and Guests to confidently transact in the short-term rental space.  
Please note that once you have booked, you will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself. Please make sure this is completed prior to check-in.

Guests will have access to the entire pictured home, including the garage. The garage can be accessed via a keypad on the right side of the garage.

We will be available at any point via phone or text to assist with your stay!

Located in Rogers' premier Hearthstone subdivision, this property is within a 5-10 minute drive of some of NWA's best attractions. This property is a 7-minute drive from the Pinnacle Hills Promenade, perfect for a shopping filled day! For those looking for nighttime activities, this home is only a 6-minute drive to TopGolf & Uptown Rogers. Looking to for a quiet getaway? Our neighborhood is perfect for you!
sectionedDescription.houseRules:
•Check-in is anytime after 3:00 PM
• No parties or events
• Pet-friendly with a fee

Hi there and thanks for booking our place! 

We look forward to your stay and accommodating you in all the ways possible. We just have a few rules, but take them very seriously. Please know that if any of the rules are broken, we will not hesitate to fine you for the below amounts:

This is a no smoking home, if you smoke in the home you will be fined $1000 plus the cost of any smoke remediation necessary. You may smoke outside.

If a party that has not been pre-arranged with us occurs or is discovered, you will be fined $1000

Please note that we charge up to $100 per hour for late checkouts if not previously arranged.

Please do not hesitate to reach out for any questions regarding these rules or anything else you may need.

reviews.comments: If your are looking for a beautiful EXTREMELY CLEAN home in a good location this is the house for you! We always stay in an Airbnb when traveling to Fayetteville/Rogers area and this is by far the nicest home. The neighborhood is quiet and very well kept. I felt at home the moment I walked in. I would not hesitate to rent Veronicas’ home again. She is also quick to respond

reviews.comments: This home was in a great location! Right in the middle of NWA with easy access to the interstate. We stayed here while the floors were being replaced in our home. It was amazingly clean and comfortable. If we ever need a place to stay in NWA again this will be our FIRST choice!

listing.name: "The Perfect Little House"

reviews.comments: Such a beautiful home in a peaceful location yet close to where we needed to go.  The master bed was extremely comfortable and the kitchen was one of the best stocked kitchens  we have encountered.   Jennifer was very communicative with us and we hope to stay here again when we make our way back to the area.

listing.name: "The Perfect Little House"

reviews.comments:
Really enjoyed this house with some friends for a week. 
Jennifer stocks it well and the value for the home is incredible.
The only potential downside is that you’ll have to drive about 15-20 minutes to get to restaurants, stores, things to do, etc.
It really wasn’t a big deal to us, but I just wanted to put that out there if anyone is curious.

primaryHost.about:
We bought the property 6 years ago and it was our primary residence. We live about 20 minutes away and I personally inspect the home before each group.  We desire for each person that stays at our property to have an exceptional stay in our favorite city. 
I have been married 15 years and have 4 kids. Our family loves traveling and staying in homes along the way.  I have been a host on another travel site for 6 years with all positive reviews for this fabulous property. Most of our guests have been multiple families for Razorback game weekends, weddings in town, family reunions.  It’s a great place to gather a large group.
primaryHost.name: Mandy

sectionedDescription.access: Access to the entire home and garage.
sectionedDescription.description:
20 minutes from the University of Arkansas, walkable to shops and restaurants in Pinnacle and Promenade area of Rogers. Great central location with easy access to the razorback greenway in neighborhood, 10 minutes to downtown Bentonville. Lots of amenities, upgrades in 3700 square foot house. 4 bedrooms and bonus room with beds set up. Multiple living rooms and a chef kitchen. Perfect for entertaining multiple families and larger groups.

We love the location of this home.  Convenient to I 49, it is 20 minutes from Fayetteville, 2 minutes from the promenade, able to bike to several restaurants. 3700 sq feet with tons of room to entertain and enjoy family and friends.

Access to the entire home and garage.

Guests will be given an entry code before check in.  We are available via text message and phone.

A family neighborhood close to several popular restaurants and the greenway. We bike to restaurants and for recreation as it connects to the neighborhood.

Use a car to arrive, can also bike to various locations close by.

Bikes available for your use. You can bike from the home to the greenway with neighborhood access to the Razorback greenway.

sectionedDescription.access: Parking is easy with over .5 miles of driveway with a circle turn around located at the entrance to the home. The home features 2 entrances and double doors leading out to the patio.
sectionedDescription.description:
Remain plugged into urban convenience while resting in the rolling hills of Northwest Arkansas on this 5 acre farmstead. The property features 7 bedrooms with 12 beds spread throughout. Multiple bathrooms and log burning fireplaces. A full kitchen adjacent to a large dining room that can seat 20 people. Views of the outdoors are found out every window. The property has a horse barn that makes for great photo opportunities.

The farmhouse is clean and in great condition. Floors were built in 1993 by a local preacher & his family. 

Families can separate by claiming 1 of 3 floors.  Or, parents can take private rooms and let kids group sleep. Plenty of accessibility and sleeping arrangements on first floor for those not interested in navigating stairways.

The full kitchen is ready for use. All local restaurants deliver to the property.

We’ve set up a ‘Selfie Scavenger hunt’. See if you can replicate it & post to Social Media!

Parking is easy with over .5 miles of driveway with a circle turn around located at the entrance to the home. The home features 2 entrances and double doors leading out to the patio.

I'm here to help with fires, directions, maintenance issues, and anything in between. I enjoy being asked for help. I can light your fires for you.

Quiet & Inviting. Views in every direction invite you off the porch.  You'll surely enjoy exploring here. Should your intrigue take you down the half-mile canopy drive and onto Ozark Acres Dr. you'll likely meet cheerful locals eager for a chat. In this neighborhood, you're being hugged and kissed by nature and neighbors! Can you believe this is available just down the street from Walmart AMP?

Seamingly the preeminent location if you're here to explore NWA. Located between the two main North/South roadways and set perfectly on the most efficient local roads for travel between all neighboring downtowns.

You'll be astonished at the convergence of unmatched, undisturbed beauty coupled with Ultimate convenience discovered here at 3168 Ozark Acres Dr.

The property connects with large field with horses. Feed them an apple to make their day. Bird watching is great. Large hawks, occasional eagles, and many colorful birds can be seen from all areas of the property. Enjoy the feel of of a cozy fire in our firepit. Many flowers and and berry bushes to enjoy.

primaryHost.about: Ken and I are outgoing, friendly and respectful. We enjoy connecting with people of all ages. Everyone is unique and that's what makes life interesting! When we travel, we spend most of the time exploring the outdoors above and below the water. We enjoy scuba diving in the Western Caribbean, white water rafting, deep sea fishing, dining out and meeting the locals. We stay pretty busy when we're at home too, volunteering at our local theater Walton Arts Center, touring gardens with the local garden club, and attending beekeeping meetings. We enjoy being a part of NW Arkansas, a rapidly growing community.
primaryHost.name: Tracy

sectionedDescription.access: Enjoy being in our split floor plan Ranch style home, including use of part of the refrigerator. Your private suite has queen-sized bed, flat screen cable TV, leather couch, dresser with clean towels and toiletries, nightstand, rocking chair and wireless internet. Your private bathroom has a combination tub/shower and blow dryer. Enjoy the jacuzzi hot tub located on the private rear deck.
sectionedDescription.description:
Up to three guests. Comfy & cozy private room with four post queen-sized bed, 6 ft leather couch, flat screen TV and dresser. Private bathroom with tub and shower. Country setting, 3+ acres by Beaver Lake. 30 minutes from UA, 20 minutes from XNA, 5 minutes from downtown Rogers, 2 miles from Monte Ne boat launch.

Frog's Leap Cottage is clean, comfy, homey, and relaxing. Three wooded acres are ideal for quiet privacy. The cicadas and tree frogs call to each other around the koi pond and hot tub. It's like living in a tropical forest Ecolodge in Costa Rica, without the annoying Howler Monkeys. Other critters include Zannie, our sweet Bengal kitty, who has been known to sleep on guests' beds if they let her into their bedroom at night. Private bedroom is large enough to accommodate three persons. No pets, please. Our Bengal is very territorial with other animals.

Enjoy being in our split floor plan Ranch style home, including use of part of the refrigerator. Your private suite has queen-sized bed, flat screen cable TV, leather couch, dresser with clean towels and toiletries, nightstand, rocking chair and wireless internet. Your private bathroom has a combination tub/shower and blow dryer. Enjoy the jacuzzi hot tub located on the private rear deck.

We love meeting new people and making their visit memorable. Tracy and Ken are friendly, knowledgeable about the area, and have flexible schedules. We love residing in "The Natural State" with its' slower pace of life and lower cost of living. This is the place to enjoy all that the area has to offer - whether you want to visit Crystal Bridges (a world-class museum), rent a boat on scenic Beaver Lake, shop and take a tour in Eureka Springs or just relax in the peace and quiet. Come visit during Bikes, Blues and BBQ in September, or see the sights in NW Arkansas anytime.

A popular resort area in the 1920s, Monte Ne Cove is less than a mile away and has a beautiful swimming area. Boat rentals are available at nearby Prairie Creek Marina. If you have kayaks, you can take them to the Monte Ne launch just down the road.

Do not follow directions on GPS if it says Wagon Wheel Road or Stoney Point because it will take you down a gravel road for miles. Go on I49 or 71B North and then head East on New Hope Rd. You can always text me for directions.

At Frog's Leap Cottage, you can unwind in the country plus have all the benefits of one of the countries' fastest growing areas. We are five minutes from historic downtown Rogers. Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, a world-class museum with outdoor walking trails, is only a 20 minute drive away. Beaver Lake with its fishing, boating, swimming and birding is here with a boat launch only 1-1/2 miles away. Also nearby is Hobbs State Park, Devil’s Den State Park, War Eagle Cavern, the Shiloh Museum of Ozark History, the Amazeum, fine dining, movie theaters and great shopping. The many events at the University of Arkansas (30 mins. away) and the festivals, farmer’s markets, music and museums of Northwest Arkansas beckon. Whether you’re coming from far or near, Frog’s Leap Cottage is peace and comfort with easy access to vibrant Ozark culture.

Our short-haired Bengal kitty Zannie is very friendly and may follow you around the house. Try to not let her out for the safety of the lizards, birds and chipmunks outside. You may want to close your bedroom door at night or she may want to keep you company at night and sleep on your bed.
sectionedDescription.houseRules: We enjoy a relatively laid-back lifestyle. Respectful. Gracious. Some pets may be welcome under special circumstances -namely if they are not a threat to our somewhat territorial cat. No unauthorized guests, excessive drinking or loud parties. We prefer for food to be eaten at the dining room table. This is a low dust household and we store household cleaners, chemicals, etc. in the garage and vacuum regularly. Smoking is allowed in outdoor areas. If possible, please park at the TOP of the driveway or next to the Escalade.

sectionedDescription.neighborhoodOverview:
A popular resort area in the 1920s, Monte Ne Cove is less than a mile away and has a beautiful swimming area. Boat rentals are available at nearby Prairie Creek Marina. If you have kayaks, you can take them to the Monte Ne launch just down the road.

Do not follow directions on GPS if it says Wagon Wheel Road or Stoney Point because it will take you down a gravel road for miles. Go on I49 or 71B North and then head East on New Hope Rd. You can always text me for directions.
sectionedDescription.notes: Our short-haired Bengal kitty Zannie is very friendly and may follow you around the house. Try to not let her out for the safety of the lizards, birds and chipmunks outside. You may want to close your bedroom door at night or she may want to keep you company at night and sleep on your bed.
sectionedDescription.space: Frog's Leap Cottage is clean, comfy, homey, and relaxing. Three wooded acres are ideal for quiet privacy. The cicadas and tree frogs call to each other around the koi pond and hot tub. It's like living in a tropical forest Ecolodge in Costa Rica, without the annoying Howler Monkeys. Other critters include Zannie, our sweet Bengal kitty, who has been known to sleep on guests' beds if they let her into their bedroom at night. Private bedroom is large enough to accommodate three persons. No pets, please. Our Bengal is very territorial with other animals.
sectionedDescription.summary: Up to three guests. Comfy & cozy private room with four post queen-sized bed, 6 ft leather couch, flat screen TV and dresser. Private bathroom with tub and shower. Country setting, 3+ acres by Beaver Lake. 30 minutes from UA, 20 minutes from XNA, 5 minutes from downtown Rogers, 2 miles from Monte Ne boat launch.
sectionedDescription.transit: At Frog's Leap Cottage, you can unwind in the country plus have all the benefits of one of the countries' fastest growing areas. We are five minutes from historic downtown Rogers. Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, a world-class museum with outdoor walking trails, is only a 20 minute drive away. Beaver Lake with its fishing, boating, swimming and birding is here with a boat launch only 1-1/2 miles away. Also nearby is Hobbs State Park, Devil’s Den State Park, War Eagle Cavern, the Shiloh Museum of Ozark History, the Amazeum, fine dining, movie theaters and great shopping. The many events at the University of Arkansas (30 mins. away) and the festivals, farmer’s markets, music and museums of Northwest Arkansas beckon. Whether you’re coming from far or near, Frog’s Leap Cottage is peace and comfort with easy access to vibrant Ozark culture.

additionalHouseRules: We enjoy a relatively laid-back lifestyle. Respectful. Gracious. Some pets may be welcome under special circumstances -namely if they are not a threat to our somewhat territorial cat. No unauthorized guests, excessive drinking or loud parties. We prefer for food to be eaten at the dining room table. This is a low dust household and we store household cleaners, chemicals, etc. in the garage and vacuum regularly. Smoking is allowed in outdoor areas. If possible, please park at the TOP of the driveway or next to the Escalade.

primaryHost.about:
Hi!   
Our names are Erik and Teneka Williams.  We are lucky
enough to have found each other early in our lives.  We are
junior high sweethearts!  We are polar opposites, while at the
same time exactly alike.

Being outdoors is where we are happiest and feel the most at
home.  We own a kayaking business (River Excursions), where
we provide all of the gear required for an overnight stay on the
river!  This gives others the opportunity to reset and take a
break from everyday life.  Along with kayaking and camping,
backpacking, mountain biking and listening to live music
brings joy to our lives, as well.

 We have an entrepreneurial spirit and thrive on working hard
towards our ultimate dream.  One of the ways that we are
working towards this dream, is through investing in real estate.
 We own 3 short-term rental properties, but look forward into
investing in commercial real estate soon.  Our ultimate dream
in life is to experience and visit all of the U.S. National Parks
and making new friends all along the way! 

We live the simple life and make the most of every day!  We want you to feel like our place is your home away from home.  We would love for you to be our guest!
primaryHost.name: Erik

The space is a 1400 sq/ft addition to the back of our house. The area is separated and has its own private entry. It is minutes from the Pinnacle Hills Promenade and the AMP! If you are looking for something close to everything with easy access to the interstate, this is the place.

Clutter free home. Right in the middle of Northwest Arkansas. Great place to relax on your vacation. We try to make everything easy and convenient.

The entry door has a smart lock. I will give the code the day of check-in.

There is parking for 2 cars at the far right side of our driveway .

Streaming video only.We provide Netflix and Hulu.We do not have cable.

We also use microwave and dishwasher safe plates and cups.

We do not allow Pets

There is a security camera overlooking the driveway.

sectionedDescription.access: The home will be entirely yours during your stay!
sectionedDescription.description:
Fully furnished, 3 bedroom, 2 bath home in a quiet and family friendly neighborhood.

Attached garage for parking.

Close to Interstate 49 in the center of the NW Arkansas region, our home is conveniently located!

Dogs less than 30 lbs will be considered if a request is made. Sorry, no cats.

This three bedroom, two full bath home will be entirely yours during your stay. With a fully furnished kitchen; office space with desk; and large, fenced in backyard, we think that your stay will be amazing!

The home will be entirely yours during your stay!

Your host and co-host live only a few minutes away and will always be available if needed.

The neighborhood is quiet and family friendly with only residential traffic. A small playground is only one block away.

In addition, the NW Arkansas Greenway Razorback trail is accessible from the entrance of the neighborhood!

Located approximately one mile from I-49, getting anywhere in NW Arkansas is easy and convenient.

There is no smoking anywhere in the house or on the property.  This house rule is strictly enforced with a $500.00 fine if smoke fumes are present.
 All pets must be approved by the host before booking.  Pets are not allowed on the furniture or the beds.  Pets that shed a lot are not welcome.  Prepare to pay for any damage to the property due to your pet and that includes hiring a professional cleaning company in order to remove pet hair from the furniture.

No pets allowed unapproved pets will be charged $250.00
